title: Not So impressive,okay okay.Little over price
body:
The media could not be loaded.
                




  ¬†#m12,#m12unboxing,#samsungm12 ,#unboxing ,#Samsung, #Galaxy, #M12,#SamsungGalaxyM12M12 unboxing videoNot so impressive Mobile from Samsung, currently direct compete with LGK42, Moto G30/G10To All people who want to purchase mobile DO NOT go on Mobile Marketing and Actors endorsing Mobile.:Remember 5G is coming hence you are getting so much discount on all 4G mobile. Mobile manufacturers are clearing stocks, Need to inform 5G mobile support 4G band but all 4G mobile will not support 5G.Take example, if you purchase 20,0000 mobile today, after 20 months you may need to change to 5G mobile hence it will cost you 1000 per month (costing matters) and you will not get High exchange value (not even 50% cost), Currently 5G yet to come in India, may be yearend or come will be high cost.Points to Remember while purchasing Mobile:1) Mobile band support, Dual Wi-fi Support is better.2) Graphics PPI matter hence check PPI value of mobile. It directly related to Mobile display and colour quality, Higher is better.3) Check Mobile camera F value (lower value, higher picture quality) if less than 1.8 is best. Mostly camera quality depends on Focal Value not on pixel4) Android upgrade support. This is important as your mobile will useless within 2 years, remember you don‚Äôt want any mobile who cannot upgrade to Android 11.5) Item Weight and height of mobile. Lower is better, it really matter as you will get pain while holding mobile for long time, specially  old people.6) Mobile resolution, Higher is better7) screen refresh rate, Higher is better8) Clean Android installation. This is also important as manufacturers cannot force you to install or retain any app.M12 /Pro6000 battery (not fully tested yet)Android 11, v11.0 operating system, One UI 3.1with 8nm Power Efficient Exynos850 (Octa Core 2.0GHz)90Hz screen refresh rateSamsung Brand (Non-Chinese)Galaxy Store supportDolby Atmos support. Currently Audio testing is going onM12 Cons720p screen resolutionNo AR support, ARcore Absentresolution with 720 x 1600 pixels resolution, low Graphics PPI 269 PPI with 16M colours221 Grams Dimensions 1 x 7.6 x 16.4 cmLCDpre-installed Bloatware some of cannot uninstalled but need to disablehigher Mobile F value (F 2.0)No headphones, no backcover ,no extra accessories.Uodate after three days:Battery still going on at 15% with 1 hour daily voice call , some whatsapp  and mostly standby.So it is power monster in battery category

title: It's a budget package. A good phone to buy in the ‚Çπ 10k bracket.
body: A very satisfying  experience with the device so  far.Pros:1. Long battery life-  I am a moderate  user who does everything  except gaming. That said , the battery lasts up to 2 full days.2. Decent cameras for the price. Pictures are satisfactory but could be better.3. Very responsive finger print sensor.4. Good sound quality, although dolby's impact  is not much pronounced5. UI is great and snappy. Lots of customization options.6. The display is good and smooth with 90hz refresh rate. It does make the difference.7. Fast charging works fine.Cons:1. The weight of the phone is on the heavier side @ 220 gms2. The display could have been a full HD+ @ 1080p3. No led notification light. All though there are apps that can do the job on an AMOLED screen.Overall, a good package.

title: Worst Samsung phone

title: Budget Samsung Phone
body: I am using this phone for the last one week and i noticed few positive and negative things about it.Positive points -‚Ä¢ Fingerprint sensor is so fast and i loved it‚Ä¢ Battery backup (6000 mAh) is amazing even after using it throughout the day‚Ä¢ Camera quality is really good and the pictures are amazing on day light‚Ä¢ Large display having a size of 6.5 inches and can run games smoothly on low graphic settings‚Ä¢ 90Hz refresh rate feels so smooth‚Ä¢ The phone doesn't lag or get heated after using it for a long time because of Exynos 850 (8nm) high-end processorNegative points -‚Ä¢ Not made for hard-core gaming because the processor is not strong enough to run games smoothly on high graphics‚Ä¢ The weight of phone is heavy‚Ä¢ The brightness level is somewhat low as compared to other phones‚Ä¢ The display that you will get is around 720 x 1600 pixels‚Ä¢ The downloading as well as uploading speed is also low as compared to other phones within this price range‚Ä¢ It is not water resistant and does not have Gorilla glass for screen protection .~ I am satisfied with this phone because of it's camera quality and battery backup ‚àö

title: Some marketing gimmicks...
body: This phone has 90hz display, but I see a lag while browing or navigating in apps, doesn't feel like 90hz at all48MP true cam when option selected gives noisy images , otherwise in normal mode works above averageBattery is excellent works for 2 daysHeating issues occur on heavy usage, in normal mode you won't notice itFront cam 8 mp just averageOverall I took 6gb 128 gb version for 13k and doesn't seem as good.Above average phone for the price....

title: Pathetic customer support
body: I bought the phone for my mother. Her usage is limited to making calls, the phone stays idle all the while. She had one more requirement that I shouldn't have to recharge it regularly. Hence choose this 6000 mAh battery phone. I was happy first few days, it gave 4+ day battery life but then an update came and spoilt everything. In 12 hours it would discharge completely. I approached the customer care and the customer care took remote access and checked logs and said, I see everything healthy in device. I told even though your log shows everything right, that doesn't translate to what I physically see. I probably had conversation for almost 10-15 mins but he was always coming to point he is not seeing problem. This was my first experience with samsung phone and this will be the last. And reason is not because product was bad but the customer support is pathetic. If I get into this kind of situation with their other products as well within a week or few weeks, I would simply waste my money. I am feeling lucky that I did not buy any of their exorbitant product and learnt the lesson at lesser cost.

title: You will be disappointed
body: Amazon hid all reviews for first few days till most of the stocks are sold out. Then after that it is not allowing to write negative reviews. I wrote my experience with so many negative points and it rejected. Still I am writing the pros & cons again.PROS:‚ñ™Ô∏éUI 3.0 is amazing. I like it a lot. It is better than Redmi, Moto, Nokia UI. (Subjective)‚ñ™Ô∏éAmazing battery life. I am getting more than 24hrs of usage after fully charged.CONS‚ñ™Ô∏éWorst camera ever. True 48MP is all bulls**t. Low light pics are also worst.Front camera is also not good.‚ñ™Ô∏éSeriously??? No Slowmotion, Timelapse & other basic features in camera.‚ñ™Ô∏éIt doesn't support Camera2Api which means I cannot download GCam.‚ñ™Ô∏éWorst Screen resolution. While everyone is giving Super Amoled display & Full HD display, what happened to you Samsung??‚ñ™Ô∏é90Hz refresh rate is just gimmick.‚ñ™Ô∏é8nm processor is also waste.‚ñ™Ô∏éWhile all others are giving Snapdragon processors, Samsung is stuck with its Exynos which is basically useless. Phone is hanging sometimes.‚ñ™Ô∏éPhone is a bit heavy and you'll have a hard time with its weight. It's like holding a powerbank.‚ñ™Ô∏é15Watt charger?? Samsung...upgrade bro.‚ñ™Ô∏éWifi only supports 2.5GHz band and no 5.0 GHz bandFinally dont get decieved by True 48MP, 8nm processor, 90Hz refresh rate and other gimmicks. You will be disappointed. I am very much disappointed. The worst thing is there is no return option in Amazon. Amazon bro...you too planned everything so well. Good job.

title: Not recommended phone. Do not buy
body: I recieved the phone today and observed that it is lagging a lot unlike like other Samsung phones. Considering it has 6gb ram it should not be hanging at all.Camera quality is terrible.Lots of heating issuesDoes not connect to 5ghz wifiOnly replacement option available for the product and not refund. So choose the product wisely only after reviewing the feedbacks.Bad network quality. Does not catch mobile network.

title: Better buy a brick!
body: Don't know if I could get more disappointed by a purchase!!The phone did look okayish in the spec sheet. But it is a very  stupid buy.The first thing you notice is  the IMPRACTICALITY of the phone.It is too heavy(220g) and too thick (about 1cm) to carry. The display is the worst anyone could get at this price point.The processor is reasonably slow. Face detection is a joke. Battery is 6000 mah but will take forever to charge. But the side fingerprint sensor was good .Camera was okayish. Add a few more bucks and buy a better phone with OLED display.

title: Average phone with bloatware : Samsung India forces to write review
body: Good phone in decent budget .Display could've been better , 90hz is not true to my usage . Since i use op7T it's clearly evident this display lacks the precision which it is said it has .Samsung India : they call me daily to inquire whether i have posted a review and what star rating should i give to the phone . This has become a headache .Dear samsung team , please do not force customer to write reviews and try to reduce the bloatware and unwanted app installations . I am starting to think MIUI was better than this .Display : not that they said / averageCamera : average / specs doesn't meetPerformance : ok for normal useBattery : good .Call quality : goodUI : Poor ,  I will not recommend samsung , this is not the one UI it was when i purchased M30S . Now this is full of bloatware and unwanted apps are getting installed by samsung store . I am puzzled on how to stop this.Overall : Very average phone . Better go for redmi note 10 or any other better phone in this price segment .Not a value for money dela

title: One of the best value for money phones
body: Good- got it for 9999- decent phone for this cost with all the necessary gizmos and bling- finger print sensor is good. fast and sensitive. Haven't tried the face unlock.- display is top notch on any good Samsung phone for this price- quality pics/ decent ( note - I'm a normal user of camera )- battery is very good. its really a monsterBad ( depends on perspective )- slightly big for small hands- it has all the dumb samsung apps inbuilt ( you can uninstall a few )- slightly heavier when you have a good solid case ( read as spigen branded )Overall very happy to have a good ( more than decent ) phone for the initial offer price.

title: Do not  buy this phone if u want good camera
body: Being die hard fan of Samsung it is very difficult to write this review.Camera quality:why say 48MP  when it doesn't even look like 13MP my Mom's Samsung  M10s  camera quality and screen quality are far better than this phone. Regret for buying this phone for such high price booked on first day of launch as it came from Samsung brand. Generallyi go by reviews  but first time ordered on  launch day becoz of the reliability.I regret for the decision i made. Do not recommend the phone for anyone.

title: Very very Poor network connection
body: Plz do not buy this mobile.. I am facing poor network issue. In my home others are using without any interruption.. Tried many things.. Asked colleagues, neighbors, mobile store person, google and tried all the ways.. But internet is very slow.. The same sim is working fine in other devise in same location. Even internet is ON it is showing you are offline when i try something. Also took nore than 45 mins to download 72 mb size app. Atlast i cancelled and came out due to intolerance. I am placing return order, will see what is gonna happen.

title: One of the best smart phone in this price!
body: Decent phone.. people say VGA cam because they didn't notice that the aspect ratio for 48 MP camera.. 48 MP cam option is only for 3:4 aspect ratio..And yea its true that the wifi doesn't support 5G bandwidth..  but over all decent mobile for decent price, Got 6GB version for 11.300 using coupon and credit cardThanking Amazon, IndusInd and Samsung!Posted pics are Shot by me on Samsung M12,Those who dont believe they can ask me for Camera Settings.

title: Poor Quality..MONSTER FOR BUYERS??
body:
The media could not be loaded.
                




  ¬†I had received this phone on 09th May 2021. For first two days it worked ok. (OK because this phone is very slow)BUT on third day, 12th May 2021, it was hanged very badly. It was neither getting switched off nor restarted..!!Immediately I have contacted the customer care for its solution. The Amazon representative has responded well and helped me to book technician's visit, which has completed on 15th May 2021.Amazon is ready for its replacement according to their 7 days replacement policy and hand to hand replacement.It was a traumatic condition for me as I have bought this phone in this COVID pandemic in very urgent condition and I badly need a phone always working 24X7 as my family was admitted in the hospital.Also, people who wish to buy it for its Camera then please beware as Samsung is advertising it as TRUE 48MP QUAD CAMERA but its result is like 8MP blurred one.Second thing is the phone is very slow and its UI is frequently NOT WORKING.Third thing is its speakers are giving old radio kind of noise.Luckily, there is no option for rating it ZERO or NEGATIVE star, else I would definitely give that rating to this product.There is "No Return Available" and only replacement option is given by Amazon.Only positive thing in this entire incident is that I have bought through Amazon and got their prompt support.I am very much thankful of Amazon as they have replaced this faulty device with new one on 16th May 2021, means within one day after technician visit.Now, I am only hoping that replaced SAMSUNG M12 mobile may perform to atleast "OK" level, if not to "GOOD or BETTER" standard.Dear Samsung, I will edit my review with positive points if I found the replaced product upto the mark..!!

title: Best Phone @12499 for 6 GB RAM/128 GB ROM Variant
body: Pros:1. Best Battery i.e. 6000mAh.2. Good Back camera.3. Good and very necessary features by Samsung One UI. (I bet you'll like it)4. Good Performance (I use a lot of apps in multitasking but I don't play games so can't review gaming performance).5. Supports 15WT fast charging.6. Display is good according to the price range. (Don't get confused on poor display reviews.)7. Side positioned fingerprint sensor is good. (In starting you can face problems if you are currently using a back fingerprint sensor)8. Low light image from the back camera is also good. One attached in the image.9. Currently(11/04/21- 15/04/21) this phone is available @11700 (effective price)using Indusind bank cards so it is a loot deal for now. (Lowest ever price for this phone)Cons:1. Very bad front selfie camera which is 8MP (If you are a selfie addict then avoid it)2. Phone is very heavy and big in size.3. Adaptive brightness is not up to the mark.4.Animations are a little bit slow.5. Contact searching speed in the contacts app is very slow.(Resloved after update)6. After every update they install MX Takatak, Moz like apps which you can uninstall anytime. ( I think to make this phone that much affordable they are trying few methods of Mi and other Chinese brands.)Result: Best phone with all the latest features in this price range. @ 11700 - 12500Important(For those reviews who are saying the phone is slow): Got to developer options(Search Google for how to enable it ) and then Set Windows Animation Scale to .5x, Transition Animation Scale to .5x, Animator Duration to .5x. (Earlier all 3 developer options are set to 1x that's why the phone seems a little bit slow).Update: After update Contact searching speed became very good.

title: It is USB 2.0 enabled device and not MHL compatible
body: I bought this phone mainly for my kids online class during this pandemic. We thought to connect the mobile with our TV through HDMI adapter so that our kids can see the class directly on TV. When we tried to connect this mobile with HDMI adapter we came to know that this is not compatible with the adapter since it's USB hub is 2.0 (Don't know why Samsung configures the old USB hub for it's new mobiles). We also checked whether this mobile is MHL compatible or not? but it's not.If you are buying this mobile only for personal use then it's a good mobile. But if you are looking this mobile for your kid's online class then PLEASE DON'T BUY THIS.

title: Samsung I love you
body: Samsung is the beat

title: Worst Samsung for me.
body: Had some expectations. Worst mobile experience. I might be happy if I have bought this phone 4 years back. Such a bad touch screen slogging performance. Nothing is good in this

title: Excellent Battery  and budget
body: I have been using this phone for more than a week and below is my feedback.1. Excellent battery and its lasts for 2 days at least on normal usage.2. Phone performance is good for normal usage such as YouTube,  Facebook or watsapp and usual games.3. Look and feel is good, easy to use.4. Phone is quite I feel probably due to battery  capacity.5. Front camera is not good but back one is good. This maybe great for selfie  lovers.6. Phone doesn't hang when multiple apps are opened.7. Worthy product  for this price based on spec and quality.I have attached  the photos taken and also same pic taken using both front and back camera  to show  the difference.  Overall it's a good budget Phone with all nice features and excellent battery.

title: Disappointed..Worst mobile ever
body: Genuine feedback after 1 week of usageGood things:Low PriceBad things:1. Battery drains very quickly..my old realme mobile was 3000mah battery but was getting me 1 full day and this phone is 6000mah Battery but drains by evening2. I am using 4GB ram and its very very slow and very lagging..very versatile very horrible3. Finger print scanner everytime i get error message could not detect correct impression try again4. It says 48mp true camera but i could not notice any difference from my old 16mp camera5. No cancelation or refund policy6. NEVER BUY FROM AMAZON IF NO CANCEL/REFUND OPTION IS THEREConclusion:Better to chose any oppo or realme mobile in this budget

title: Did Not Meet Basic Expectation
body: The phone doesn't meet the basic expectations from at a 10k budget segment and I was surprised to find that the MRP is INR 15499. The camera is a false 48MP and not at all true and the sensor has a very poor performance. There is no support for 5Ghz Wi-Fi which is strange to find at this age of mankind. The speed and performance of this octa core processor is sloppy.The only thing good about this phone is the battery backup and the storage provided in the higher configuration. If you are buying this phone for a standby purpose, then it is fine and worth the money. If you are considering to buy this as a primary phone, take deep breaths and look further for better options in the same budget segment.Always check the manufacturer website for specification details before buying the product.

title: Slowest anf dumbest phone on phone, do not buy , don't go on it's cost
body: Call button speed:Worst phone speed, it take at least 10 seconds to start dial once you touch the dial button.Face detection:If you put Khichdi mixture on gas , and simultaneously try to unlock phone with face detection, I am sure khichdi will get cooked faster than your face detection.Finger scan unlock-Lock button amd finger scan button are same, and stopped working within month.Camera quality:Sony Ericsson 2Mega pixel cera of 2006 had better clarity than thia camera.Working speed:This phone is winner in speed race, if you remember the tortoise and rabbit story.Moral of the story :Worst phine by samsung

title: 48mo camera a dream
body: Very bad product.I never think such a product will come from Samsung.It had 48 MP only for show.Photos are not clear .On checking the photo size I found that 12mp again I was astonished I contacted customer care of Samsung they told me to change the camera setting 48 MP then I got photo in 48mp the clear not better than previous one .It gives very low quality photo again.It was my experience.I had bought by dreaming photo clarity.Net work problem is usually Samsung problem here .The only better thing in this phone is battery and quick charging

title: processor,  battery are ok , Fingerprint sensor,camera and UI not good
body: After a long span of time say 3 years, im back to Samsung. Now, Samsung realise that selling their name is no more working and reduce the price at the level of other company to success in the market . I bought 6 gb one and very happy with it now.However,  as before, many of the inbuild apps irritating me which are not uninstallable.After using it for 3 months plus, let me give my fair opinion:1. Battery life makes me happy, but fast charging needs 2 hrs plus is little bit annoying.2. Camera must not be more than 12 Megapixel. As compared to my previous phone MI Note 6 pro, I dont see any better snap here.3. Finger print sensor is absolutely annoying. Most time i have to enter my password manually as FP sensor do not detect my fingerprint. How my previous phone MI Note 6 pro nicely detects my fingerprint and easily open phone has been missing here.4. As MAH is more, thr weight of phone is bit heavy. I dont know why Silicon cover of around Rs 99 approx cannot be attached here in the package!! I bought silicon cover from Amazon but lately arrived which cause my phone screeen crack due to fallen from my bed. If it was in Silicon cover, the Lcd must have been intact till now. MI 6 Pro had come with one extra phone safety cover but Samsung cannot.5. After two years , I come to Samsung again hoping much UI improvement. However, i found Samsung do not compete with even MI in certain ways. I need to put Alarm clock on, i can easily go directly to all clock setting by clicking wall paper clock in MI while this phone need me to go to the clock in menu and so. When a turn on torch, i can easily turn it off by pressing power button in MI while this phone needs me to open screen and tap on torch icon in menu manuallyAs off now, i can point out these points to ascertain my judgement. I will comeback after using a year if get time

title: Performance & price
body: In dis price u can afford M12 ...no doubt...overall excellent performance

title: Positively warning, Never buy it. Terrible product. Never gonna buy samsung again.
body: Edit1: adding on after using it for a few months, the call quality is terrible and microphone is also not working properly, Please look after other ones, waste of moneyThough the battery life is great, the charge time is long. Don't buy it. The performance  drop is so exaggerated. We can't switch between  apps without waiting for 3 to 4 seconds minimum.  Camera quality is bad as well.Edit 2:Worst mobile I have ever bought. Never buy it. There are lots of bugs, wifi calling gets switched off automatically, Sim signal service are irritating. Bluetooth is of inferior quality. Lte settings change automatically.

title: Surprisingly great!
body: This phone is great! Writing this review after 2 weeks of using.Battery, camera, display all are good...and Battery is üëç.  Here some sample of photos attached.Phone is little bit heavy..for that large battery.Processor is good for daily use...but not for gaming.  Phone üîä is also good.Thank you Amazon.

title: Good phone for a great price. Not a snapdragon chip, but that is not an issue.
body: Amazon did a great job with the delivery of this product. Ordered and received on the same day.On the phone: I am happy with it. Have been using this phone for 3 days. The battery lasts for 1and half days with gaming and binge watching videos.The screen is comfortable. No issues on the screen, though  it is not amoled for an average user it is not a big difference.For the price this is a great buy, of course there is no snapdragon chip. But the exynos 850 is 8nm and at this price point is comparable to most snapdragon 6series chipsets.Camera is decent. As long as you are not a professional photographer,  this will be good enough to take atleast average if not great pics. (Some  pics are really great).This is definitely not an iPhone or one plus. But for the price it definitely is great.

title: Payment issue
body: Product is okayBut I cancelled order to get discount by paying for the same product by credit card.Disappointed that it was rejected.

title: Samsung m12 better backup experience it's excellent
body: I'm writing this review after using few days I must say samsung m12 is great phone  in  budget segment  compared to vivid v17 and realme 6pro that I'm already using  samsung m12 better backup  is excellent after 12hr using only 30% 0f better  used but I'm requesting  samsung  to do some important on all cameras  in next update  actually need some improvement  but  I must say in Rs.10999/  this the best samsung m12 phone if anyone thinking to buy samsung m12 please go for it ...but befor that few things I'm not happy with phone is1) network connectivity need updated as soon as possible2) Amazon, Amazon prime, flipkart and eew more apps not working bugs is their.3) YouTube also buffering after connected 6mbps speed network4) In the software I think lost of bugs are their need updat as soon as possible. from my side I like it very much thanks samsung for this budget phone  thanks Amazon for one day delivered

title: Not compatible with 5 GHz wifi
body: This phone is not compatible with 5 GHz wifi. I have JioFiber which is having 142 Mbps speed but my wifi network is not visible in phone's WIFI.I called to Samsung customer care and he informed that this phone will be connected to wifi which is having 2.5 GHz.I am returning back this product.

title: Good for this price range except no dual band wifi support
body: Camera picture quality not up to the par! But considering the price range, it is acceptable!But no 5GHz band support! Unacceptable in 2021!!90Hz screen refresh rate does not feel like 90Hz!Lot of lag is present! Don't know if that is a software bug!Battery performance is good!!Speakers are good, as expected.Overall, except the WiFi dual band support issue, rest is acceptable in this price range!!

title: Awsome phone with brick size.
body: Recently I bought this galaxym12 for Rs.11k. Overall ok. But onething have to remember thst is thickness of the phone. Its 10mm THICK. Just like a brick in your pocket. Overall dimension of the phone also big. Hight , width, especialy thickness. Before i bought i didn't noticed the sizes of the this piece. Thats my mistake too. But u guys please concern about this review before you buy. Otherthan size completly ok at this price.

title: Good Features, okayish Phone
body: I gave it 4 Stars for the features that do work and not because it's a great phone. Considering price I paid for It I am reviewing it.Pros: Good Battery Life, Great Fingerprint sensor placement, Speakers are good as well for the price, Widevine L1 support with Dolby Atmos too. Storage is plenty with Expandability. Form factor I found good Too.Cons: Performance; sometimes it lags and the 90hzs is a gimmick, the UI itself is too laggy to notice it's smoothness. They went wrong in cameras too, just because they can afford to put a 48 megapixel camera doesn't mean it's good. The ISP is bad and makes even the bayered photos look noisy. I would suggest to use a GCam mod, then again I didn't find one that works perfectly for Exynos 850. Also other 3 cameras are just as bad if not worse. Shooting raw helps if you have the time to edit it later on Lightroom or snapseed.Also Noticed that the software adds background blur that looks unnatural, at f2.0 this should not happen at all.Get it for you parents.

title: Nice product
body: Actually i brought this phone on focus to the 6 gb ram, 128 gb storage, 48 mp camera & 6000ah battery. Later on viewing the review of some customer i  was very upset & regreting myself. But when i received the item and my experience on the phone is 100% satisfy with the product. Awesome phone on this price range.Thank amazon & its seller partners, once more thank for courier partner too which help to delivery my item on time & safty.  Thank all

title: does not work with 5GHz wifi
body: Don't get duped by this phone. The description of the phone does not describe wifi support anywhere. Who makes a phone without 5GHz support in the year 2021!!! Apparently Samsung does. This pathetic piece of plastic does not support for 5GHz wifi.

title: Miserable phone. Don't buy it.
body: Dear friends, believe me. Don't waste your money on this phone. This is the worst phone I have ever purchased. It is slow and hangs often. The network connectivity is very poor. My Jio 4G sim, which was working perfectly on my old phone is miserably slow on this phone. For watching YouTube videos, you have to wait for minutes for the video to load. I can't believe such a miserable phone can come from Samsung. And to crown it all, there is no option for return...! You can only request for a visit by the Amazon expert. I don't believe it will do any good.After two weeks I exchanged this rubbish with a Realme phone on Flipkart. I lost around Rs. 5000 on this deal, but it is better than suffering such s miserable thing. Because of this cheating I am leaving Amazon.

title: Don't buy . Screen is worst . Slow charge . Camera too bad .
body: Worst product by samsung.Don't buy this mobile.Very slow charging. In one hour charge upto 3 to 4 percent onlyDisplay is too poor qualityDischarge very fast . In a day you have to charge 2 timesCamera is very bad.

title: Samsung phone are worst quality
body: Very worst phone. Just waste of money and time. I did not any support from Samsung team and Amazon. The battery and charger getting heated up. When I call Samsung customer service they said as you have purchased from Amazon they will not support. Amazon team say that as this a Samsung phone you can call them. They are playing games and I was completely cheated by them. If you purchase from Amazon Samsung team no warranty for this product is only 7 days from the day of purchase.So be careful before you purchase the electronic from Amazon you can get cheated them.I have paid RS 11000 towards this phone.

title: Such a worst service from Amazon
body: Hi Guys, dont buy this mobile. Front camera is too bad although it has 8mp. Main camera has 48 mp. But still there is no night mode, continuous shots panorama options. I used to have all these options in my earlier samsung mobile which is a 3 years back model. Mobile gets heated very easily although I just use it for calls and little browsing . Display is not amoled so dont expect much quality here.Phone is too heavy to keep in pocket also. And finally amazon is not replacing phone although we complaint on the first day of receiving it, they simply arrange a technician visit in the last 7 days they arranged visit for 3 times . But no technician visits simply they call from Gujarat when mayne is Hyderabad and simply say we will replace mobile but to amazon they say everything is fine and close the ticket. So finally understand that these technicians are nothing but amazon employees only and Amazon I'd dragging till the replacement deadline ends . They never gonna replace mobile also leave about return.And finally this is my first mobile bought in Amazon. Till now I used to buy in Flipkart. I never had any issue with Flipkart. I decided not buy any electronics in amazon from now onwards. Finally I felt I wasted around 9k on this shit model from Samsung and buying in the great indian bluffing sale of amazon. Thanks to Amazon and Samsung for your wonderful committment to customer. You keep loosing for sure many customers during to ur bluffing stuff.

title: Sir, I am really sorry however, M12 supports only 802.11 b/g/n 2.4GHz.
body: "Sir, I am really sorry however, M12 supports 802.11 b/g/n 2.4GHz."- This is the response from Samsung customer service when I inquired why not able to detect to my Router 5G. Even 6K Chinese mobiles have 5G detection - so before you buy think and check as the mobile has very limited features. The battery life is not great while it is 6000.... and camera is very normal standard. The mobile as a whole is a big compromise to the cost and is not a value for money product.

title: Overall good product..
body: Pros :6 gb ram128 gb storagePlus 48 mp back cameraHuge 6000mah batteryLooks are pretty good as wellFingerprint sensor is on the sideCons :Front camera is horribleScreen is not upto the markDue 6k mah battery it is little bit heavyOnly 15 watt chargerNo slow mo or other features in cameraConclusion:If you use it for general use, storage, binge watching it is a great phone but if u are gamer, photo addict, looks then it's not worth it.Although great phone by Samsung in this price range.

title: Worst product from Samsung
body: I bought this phone for reputed brand, 128GB memory, 6 GB RAM.But my bad nothing is working :- It buffers every 5 seconds in each and every audio, video including downloaded videos/audios.- Does not have 5GHz wifi singal acceptance. It shows only 12 Mbps for a 200Mbps fiber comnection for 2.4GHz wifi signal.- Mobile voice network is always low. Voice break always happens, where as all my other mobile works fone.- All applications are very slow and crashes. (Faulty software even after updates).- Sound system including ring tone is very low.- Hotspot goes off multiple times without any reason.- Battery backup 12-14 hours and takes too long to charge- No support from Samsung (Closed 3 tickets without responding)Please don't buy, you will waste yor money.

title: wifi doesn't support 5ghz WIFI band
body: Very disappointed, single band wifi doesn't support 5ghz WIFI band. My 5years old Lenovo k4 note mobile able to connect 5g wifi.  Future is 5g. But this mobile not even supports to connect 5g wifi network

title: Not worth the money spent.
body: I bought Samsung Galaxy M12. Initially, the mobile worked good but for the past 3-4 days the mobile is geting heats up even without using and while charging it hets heats up.Since this mobile carried 1 year warranty for manufacturing device and 6 months warranty for in-box accesories including battery.I request Amazon or Samsung(manifacturer) to replace the said mobile at the earliest.

title: Blown away by M12 impressively
body:
The media could not be loaded.
                




  ¬†Battery life has just blown me away impressively... A great screen and a good processor... I play heavy games on it. I'm just loving it so much. 90 herts refresh rate at this price... Feels even better than my one plus 7 pro and I feel no difference between this and my s21 ultra

title: Average Phone
body: Cons-Camera is average.Display dosent feel as smooth as 90 hertz it feels just like normal display.Battery life is ok but not as per 6000 mah only last 1.5 days with moderate usage.Also samsung does not provide any back cover with this mobile so if u buy this mobile do purchase a backcover.Pros-Customisation of samsung is good...lot of themes to change the look of your mobile screen.Buit quality is ok.Sound quality is good.Fingerprint reader is fast.Don't trust Youtubers who are just marketing this mobile for sake of money....These people are biggest frauds.

title: Budget sized Beast!
body: Absolute delight for a budget smartphone! Just ordered it yesterday and got it today within 24 hours. It has it all 6gb RAM 128gb memory. Further two sim slots and a dedicated mem card slot. It's got a 3.5mm headphone jack as well. Also it's got it's own 15w fast charger in box. That is amazing! It's MRP is 15499rs but was in sale in Amazon for 12499rs. A further 10% discount on SBI credit card so deducting 1249rs and another discount on EMI deducted another 440rs and finally got this beast of a phone for just 10803rs! Now isn't that something. Really happy with the purchase as it's for my dad. He too had something to smile about amid this deadly pandamic. Thank u Samsung and thank u Amazon!

title: Best Budget phone in last few years and it‚Äôs so smooth
body: No need to underestimate exynos 850, with 90Hz refresh rate.it‚Äôs not disappointed me. I bought it as second phone(I use iPhone SE 2020).With normal use more then 48hrs still 44% battery leftFingerprint sensor is unbelievable it‚Äôs so quickCamera is decent enough to capture picturesDisplay Quality is GoodOverall I felt good for buying it for 9999/- with ICICI credit card offer.It‚Äôs worth buying, it‚Äôs far better than other MI with same price (10999-12999 in 4GB -64GB ) as Samsung don‚Äôt irritate with adds and also more secured

title: Highly disappointed
body: I got this M12 (4 / 64 gb and 6000 battery) as an upgrade to the M01 Core (1 / 16 gb and 3000 battery) phone, in the hope that it would be better ... BUT:1.  battery despite being double the size does not last any longer ..... 50-60% after only1 day of light use (I dont do any social stuff, only 3-5 talks and 1-3 messages per day);2. the ringtone and message notification choice is very poor .... had to import from the old phone;3. could not download ringtones directly to phone, but this may well be more of a problem related with Google;4. software is not friendly, even after 1 full day of struggle, have not been able to locate / access storage card;5. was very happy with the 1 / 16 gb in my earlier phone and never had memory usage beyond about 60%, but this guy eats up more than 2 gb out of the 4 gb RAM even to start with even after i have uninstalled most of the "apps";6. one of the reasons of purchasing this was for its USB teethering, which works fine.Bring back the good old button phones (with proper software as 15 years back, and with some improvement in screen / pixels) and get rid of the bloatware.Think.

title: Budgetary Phone for Frequent Callers
body: Look, feel and finish of the phone is good and up to the standards of Samsung. I am a frequent traveller and caller so was looking for a budgetary phone which has most of the features along with good battery backup. This meets my requirement.Pros:- Fit and finish is very good- Good battery backup- Performance is good with fast response- Storage and ram is sufficient as I opted for 6 GB RAM and 128 GB storage variant- Responsive finger printing sensor- Loud and clear sound with and without speaker for calls- Clear voice callingCons:- Heavy weight makes it difficult to hold and use- The screen is HD only. Not even FHD but supports 1080 p video viewing- 4 K videos will never play in 4 K mode. Only can be played in 1080 p resolution- No gyroscope and magnetometer sensor which means, compass application and some games which use these sensors will never work- No Corning Gorilla class. Screen is prone to scratches without cover- Sound is below average for music listeners- Double tap doesn‚Äôt work to wake up the screenConclusion:Only go for this if you are using for phone calls with good battery backup. Not worth for entertainment purpose. I can still survive on this as I have an iPad for entertainment. Samsung is marketing it in such a way where none of the sensors specifications and entertainment features are mentioned clearly on the website as it is not having any of them. It‚Äôs a true calling phone !

title: Good Budget phone
body: I gifted my mom this phone in November 2021 and got a better discount for 64GB. Overall it is good, even i feel the size is big but its not that broad while holding it in your hands. Screen quality is good, Camera performs really well in daylight, in low light it suffers a bit and pictures are not that clear and color is also not that accurate. Battery is very good, it goes for more than a day and half (As usage is off-course not that much) but considering the price i believe this is a good choice, Samsung has some bloat ware which you can avoid by unchecking the boxes while setting up at the first time, or delete the apps after your first setup. Rest no major complaints, charger is not turbo charge but it does it work as expected. Thx

title: Great mid range Phone !!
body: This phone is amazing for the price. Phone runs smooth considering it's a Exynos 850 Octa core processor. I like the 90Hz screen and I keep it ON all the time.  The fingerprint recognition is extremely fast and reliable. It has a decent camera, the battery is long lasting. The only deal breaker is that it doesn't support 5GHz Wi-Fi. Android 11 with One UI 3.1 is clean and very responsive and runs smooth without stutter or lag. One can avoid ads and bloatware if you setup the device carefully. I haven't seen a single ad on my device and I have been using it for almost 3 weeks.It's the best budget phone for the features you get. Doesn't look or feel cheap.

title: Already opened or used
body: So far I ve no issues regarding the producr quality and delivery,it was gud...further comenting after using the product for a week or so...but as revealed above in the pictures,I think I ve got a used or already opened product,I mean whenever I ve bought the product from the store,I ve got it well packed and sealed(in a transparent plastic cover)but here....it is without any covering or seal.Thats why our family never likes to buy such stuff from amazon....flipkart is best for electronic items and gazettes

title: Por quality of parts and an overall disappointment
body: The build feels flimsy and cheap, I got one with a bent display. Unfortunately I never realised this defect until I went to pick up a back case and it wouldn't fit.Back at the Samsung service centre they said it isn't covered under warranty, and I should've returned it at the time of delivery.Camera is nowhere close up 48MP as claimed, pictures clicked with it are mediocre, to say the least.The only saving grace is the decent battery life.It's a good phone to stay away from though

title: Good device with some major issues.
body: This phone is mostly suited for multimedia, video, internet, office work.Pros-1. Good battery, 2. Connectivity, 3. Knox Security, 3. Design, 4. Price(because samsung mobiles are costlier), 5. Camera, 6. Durability, 7. Side mounted fingerprint, 8. Quick finger print reading, 9. Display (although it's a tft panel but picture quality is quite impressive), 10. Type c, 11. Fast charge, 12. Ui.Cons-1. Heavy weight, 2. Quiet thicker, 3. Processor (heating issue, sometimes heats up without any reason maybe because of background process), 4. Ui lags, could be more optimized, 5. Display (samsung could have given atleast ips panel), 6. Charger(15w charger is not sufficient for a 6000mah battery) 7. Because of ui and processor the battery service becomes very bad which could be good although.

title: Very nice phone, great value.
body: I am Samsung user for longest time and despite some negetive reviews, I say best value for money. Only downside are its heavy, but you get use to it and the screen quality. Yes, side by side my other Samsung its a let down, but of its own it's absolutely fine. So, if high quality OLED is must for you then get the one of the other models.Rest no hang issues, does not heat, brilliant battery (as a backup phone on extreme power saver mode it lasted over 5 days!).

title: Good budget phone
body: I got it delivered yesterday. So these are my first impressions after initial setupSize:This is a huge phone. So if you have small hands this phone cannot be used single handed. If you need to use it single handed often, better go for a grippy case with a string or a ring case so it doesn't fall out. Or go for a small phoneSpeed:It is a bit slow, but you can get used to it. For the price range, it seems to have a decent performance.Audio:This phone is advertised as supporting Dolby Atmos but that's only for bluetooth or other audio devices. Not for the phone speaker. Which is kind of a shame. But the audio is not bad.Video/Screen:Blacks are not exactly black. But again, for this price you shouldn't notice those things.Colors are bright***The phone is country locked. So to activate any other country sim you must first use an Indian sim for 5 mins cumulatively.I have not tested the other features like camera, fingerprint sensor etc. Will update as soon as I do

title: Do not buy this Adware phone!
body: This phone comes with a ton of garbage Apps pre Installed. Samsung appears to be partner with IronSource which is a mobile app advertising company and they will keep bugging you to install tons of non sense apps. Over 10 apps were installed on my phone without my permission or without me asking or agreeing to anything. I did not expect this from Samsung phones, I know this is the case with most chinese phones such as Xiaomi but figures even Samsung comes with such Adwares. I wouldn't have bought this phone if I knew it was an Adware phone. You have been warned.

title: Best budget phone under 10k
body: I was looking for a budget phone but didn't want to exceed 10k mark. And eventually I came across this model which was under discount. It was for 9499 and just ordered it right away. I don't have to tell you guya about samsung. The processor is more than capable of handling day to day task with ease. The best part is its battery. It lasts 2 days easily. And the camera is good enough to take photos and selfies. It's a win win. Thanks amazon for the sweet deal.

title: Good value for money - (12/12/21) - Samsung Galaxy M12 (Blue,6GB RAM, 128GB Storage) - .
body: 16/12/21Re-review, after one week of usage, ( learning the product better). I recall my review on12/12/21.Good value for money.  After learning the product and it's  features, I find my choice is worth.I have no idea how the picture quality is coming different & good to first few pictures.I am happy with my purchase.Thanks.__________12/12/21 - not the value for money - Samsung Galaxy M12 (Blue,6GB RAM, 128GB Storage)Review is based on first three days use.Reason for this purchase - switching from MotoXForce, due to irreplaceable exhausted battery & incresed ROM need.Rating for Amazon as market place - 4/5. (good display of available options, window shopping, product information, product comparison, communication)Rating for product - Samsung Galaxy M12 (Blue,6GB RAM, 128GB Storage):One star out of Five - Utter poor camera quality - 48MP quad cam image quality is damn inferior than my previous 24MP MotoXforce image. So unimaginable from Samsung. I find Galaxy S3 images are so fine quality.Battery charging not as fast, as the listing claims.Battery life (6000mAh) - not in tune with expectation, ehausts sooner.Fingerprint reader -  not always recognising. (perhaps the narrow finger print sensor limitation)This is disappointing.I encourage you go for a better option than M12.Thanks.

title: Good one with powerful battery
body: Good one. Serves the purpose. Good phone in budget. Powerful longlasting battery. A bit bulky and a bit slower (compared to higher mid range phones) considering 6GB RAM but you can turn off the animations (by activating developer mode) to make it faster. Still very few apps r a bit slower but that is quite acceptable as it doesn't irritate. Getting 6GB RAM for INR 11500 is awesome. It is not that slow also. Camera is good but shutter speed is slower. Hence, u need to be very steady while clicking pictures in low light else they turn out to be shaky. Nonetheless, a very descent camera in this range. Very difficult to get 6GB RAM Samsung in just 11500. Overall happy about this purchase. Good if u want a phone around 10K. Much better than simply spending 20-30K for few added features. Good if u want a secondary phone for office use (checking emails, etc.). Good for kids online classes. Sturdy enough. If u want non Chinese phone and r getting 6GB RAM in 11500 nothing like it. Just go for it. No regrets. Loving this phone.

title: Okay phone
body: Packaging - Bad (Though the item was fulfilled, Amazon?). After few days of usage; okay phone. New software.The battery does not feel like 6000mah; last 24-28 hours on low to just mid-level usage.A heating issue with 20 mins of YouTube watch and a notification is displayed that the device will be automatically turned off due to heating (while charging).The overall company wants to earn with this without much bothering about the value proposition.

title: Just Go For It!
body: ( I have the 6GB/128GB variant and this User Review is on this model ) If you are a NORMAL User like me....who does not play any Games or doesn't use the phone camera much......and just use it to phone call, binge some movies or TV Shows or listen to some quality music, then this phone is EXCELLENT for Usage. Go for the 6GB/128GB variant as some of the RAM and STORAGE is already occupied by the system. The display is good for viewing too... not too bad. PROS I FOUND AFTER MY USER EXPERIENCE:1) Android 11 out of the box, ONE UI CORE 3.1 is awesome and simplistic.2) It has DOLBY ATMOS for headphones which definitely gives a difference.3) The weight and thickness is AVERAGE and you won't even notice anything.4) Fingerprint Scanner is working well and good.5) Some of the Motion and Gestures settings are really cool and useful.6) The HIGHLIGHT of this phone is the Battery, and for me it lasted completely for 3 days straight on normal calls and some youtube.The charging time is worth it for the battery duration. This phone will get updates till android 13 or 14, which is great. The Exynos 850 8nm Processor is working well in terms of speed and smoothness. The 90Hz Refresh Rate is great and I felt the difference in smooth animations. A GREAT FULL ON PACKAGE FOR A NORMAL USER.

title: Don't Buy, No Exchange
body: This phone is not listed on Exchange models while buying a new phone which means Samsung has delisted its own product. That's how Junk this product is for Samsung. Amazon says exchange is listed by seller. We buy from Amazon and not Samsung. Add some more money and buy better products then electronic junks on Sale especially Mobile Phones.Sale period defective and faulty units are rolled out otherwise a new product cannot have problems within a month. title: Decent phone for someone who doesn't use too many apps.
body: Overall the phone is good...huge screen size and battery life is superb! However, I have been facing issues with the performance of the phone. At times it runs slow, inspire of having just the basic apps installed. There are also instances where when I have to click the send button which in some apps is located on the top, it automatically takes me to another app!The only way to solve this issue then is by restarting the phone...and this happens on a daily basis. I have tried reformatting the phone to resolve the issue but it still remains. Also the colours of the photos arnt as dynamic as compared to the Samsung S10.

title: Simple, yet premium
body: I would say it's a decent mobile for the price.*Battery is outstanding*Display could have been better*Camera is decent and obviously can't expect more for the price.*90HZ really makes this phone special.*5g is not available, that's kinda disappointing.*The phone is also kinda heavy.Overall, a mediocre mobile phone for the price.

title: Disappointed with performance
body: After having used an Mi A2 for about 2 years, this phone was a step down. The prices are similar, and both phones are 4G/64GB.Found this samsung phone thicker, heavier and slower. UI is a bit sluggish. Clear chat on whatsapp is almost always slow (it was very quick on Mi A2). Googlepay PIN keypad does not render properly (some numbers are cropped). A2 has dual speakers with better sound, and a qualcomm processor.The pros of M12 are : display is nicer, the battery is better, and the camera quality is better (don't like the auto play of videos in camera app, haven't found a way to turn it off yet).If I were to choose between the two, would go with Mi A2 (lighter, sleeker, faster, better sound).

title: Wonder phone one must possess for multiple usages.
body: Wonderful product. Power packed. Very handy. Easy to operate. Light weight. Value for mon ey. Excellent phone I have ever come across. Powerful battery lasting very long between recharges. I used it for whole day still battery dropped very little. Amazing. No heating  up of battery even after long continuous usage. Very sleek and thin design. Large RAM  and ROM. Delivery by Amazon was on time. Overall five stars without any hesitation.

title: Defective Product
body: Purchased mobile on 12th April 2021. IMEI number blocked on 20th April 2021. Enquired with Amazon they just simple told, replacement period over, not able to return the item.Again enquired with Samsung authorized service centre, they told it's a defective product, please discuss with amazon customer care, they only able to replace the item.If this product is purchased from Shop (offline) , maximum 14 days validity for replacement.Now need to change the mother board, it will take minimum 15 days. myself helpless from amazon. Please try to avoid the purchase from amazon.

Bought another one in black for my daughter and she too is in awe, even though she was using an IPhone 6 S. And it has been mentioned on the box, that it is manufactured in India. Another plus point. One can go for it with eyes closed, if budget is around Rs. 10k approx. If one is ok and satisfied with the features offered. Happy shopping.

title: LAGGING PHONE
body: It took me an hour to set up the phone as all the pre installed aps were updating one after the other, making the phone lag. After setup, I had to uninstall all the unnecessary app in order to ensure smooth running of the phone. Each time I try and install a low graphic game the phone starts lagging. The RAM is incapable to handle any low end gaming.  The phone is very bulky and the hands start to hurt if you're watching any video content. All in all, its not what I wanted it to be. Thumbs down!

title: Samsung's worst phone
body: This is by far the worst phone from Samsung. I upgraded from old Galaxy on7 pro to this one because it promised better OS, better screen refresh rate, better storage and better camera quality. But to my dismay, none of these is a wow factor in this phone except for battery life. The phone hangs every 5-10mins with only 2 apps running. The screen response rate is pathetic and camera quality below par, not sure what they mean by 48MP camera. Don't take this phone even if someone offers it to you for free. It's a headache more than a utility. I would urge Amazon to bring down such a pathetic product from their website because it will spoil their brand name as well.

title: Battery performance improved after latest update
body: I took this mobile for the battery performance.. and it was one of best phone i ever seen.. last month it was taking upto 2 days to drain the battery... then after one update.. it became worst it is taking only 20 hrs to drain complete battery.. and during night time also it is taking around 25 % battery. before update it was taking hardly 1 % battery in night times..worst part of the software it is not even showing which app takes more battery..With the latest update the battery and phone performance got very good..Camera is improved a lot..auto brightness setting is still take lots of time to settle.. sometimes it does not works need to adjust manually..Overall best phone with price point..

title: Great phone pocket friendly
body: Got this phone for my dad who loves YouTube and watching news.Pros: Great battery life (need charging once in two days with moderate use), Supports fast charging, No Androidware thus very smooth UI and no lag, excellent 4 camera in rear and brilliant front facing camera, Runs on latest Android and processor is quite peppyCons: Slightly bigger in length and little heavy compared to others, Future Android upgrades not clear, Not 5G enabledTips: I got this phone under 9.5K so wait for the right deal.

title: Good for average usage; no wifi calling, speaker volume very low
body: Good phone for average daily use. I am slightly disappointed as wifi calling feature is missing. My old M30 had wifi calling two years ago. Also, the call volume is very low, I have to press against my ear to listen to calls.

title: Awesome phone
body: Samsung Galaxy M12 features a 6.5-inch HD+ Infinity V display with 720x1600 pixel resolution. The smartphone display comes with a 90Hz refresh rate. Samsung Galaxy M12 is the only smartphone in this price range to come with this high refresh rate. Samsung Galaxy M12 comes with an adaptive refresh rate which means that the panel cannot be locked at a high refresh rate. The high refresh rate display functioned smoothly during scrolling through Facebook and Instagram. For some reason, the refresh rate on the Samsung Galaxy M12 is locked at 60Hz for the notification centre. Also, the 90Hz mode is turned off while using apps like YouTube. Despite the high refresh rate and HD+ resolution, the display on Samsung Galaxy M12 is not that sharp and vibrant. The brightness is also not great and you might face some struggle while using the smartphone under direct sunlight. The display is large enough for you to enjoy movies and also play games. The display also comes with an eye comfort shield which reduces the blue light from the screen and prevents eye strain. The display on the Samsung Galaxy M12 is decent but it is definitely not the selling point of the handset.

title: Not worth it
body: Simply you better to skip this phone I break my old screen so suddenly I need to buy I brought this because I get it in good price but after I receive I realized it's simple useless ü§£ my old 3gb ram phone (I brought in 2018) 100 times better than this it's easily struck most of time touch doesn't working screen just break because I sleep on it you can't play pubg in it no games you can't use much outside in summer or do work much it's easily shut down phone easily over heat many problems .. people who need phone for simple thing like calling watching YouTube better to buy this

title: Buy if you don't want to use much apps
body: - Processor is good and all the apps works perfectly, doesn't hangs, multiple apps could run without abruptly closing or need to close.- Best for people who don't want to make use of heavy apps like snapchat- Camera quality is okay not so good when compared to M21. But looking at the cost of the phone this feature is justified.- Supports normal and wifi video calling without any issues- Speaker sound is okay, same cost factor- Two features which I feel are thereal drawbacks.  Finger print sensor is from the  side power button which is just below the volume button so you need to press it very carefully else it asks for phone restarting or switching off.- Second is not a real major one but the phone is very heavy in weight.- Battery life is okay you may continuosly watch movie or videos or use phone for 6-8 hours, takes 2 hours for full charging. Phone gets heat up in 1-1.5 hours of continuous use.- Display is good- Face ID works better than finger print.- Call recording and voice calling are clear- Have port for ear phones.- Hotspot feature is okay because phone started heating up when I turned hotspot on.- No network issues with either of the nano SIM

title: Review after agressive using for 2 days
body: To be honest i was totally skeptical whether i should buy this phone or not,  seeing so many negative comments, I took the risk and bought it..After using the phone aggressively for 2 days i must say as i read from the reviews that this phone Hangs on operation which is totally FALSE .Phone totally works fine. Having a refresh rate of 90Hz the phones doesn't show any delay, the UI is smooth battery is quite strong . Using aggressively at max only consumed 46% of battery in two days (discharged from 100% to 54%).The only thing that will disappoint you is its Camera Which works like a 6-8MP camera.Macro shots are not that detailed either.Front camera is just like having a 2-3 MP camera.Samsung should have uplifted camera quality when they mentioned it with 48MP camera.This phone will disappoint you in terms of camera quality.Rest the phone just works very well in terms of other configurations.

title: Best batteryPretty good deal .Luv Samsung and Amazon for fast delivery and deals
body: This phone is the best in this price range with best battery and camera performance. I would have more pleased if it had an amoled display . Surely Samsung had the ability to imply an amoled screen but they didn't . They could have used Snap dragon 600 series chipset instead of the exynos. But still this is the best phone under this budget. Better that A21s of Samsung . It's the best 10k budget phone now. Don't get confused with f12 it's just same as M12.

title: Battery, Camera and Screen
body: Awesome budget phone with all the features that is required for daily use like 6000 mah battery which last upto 1 day after internet serving, watching videos, listening music and lot more.Screen resolution and screen size is really well in this budget and you can't expect better than this within this budget.Processor is also good for normal and average use, its not made for playing heavy graphics game like PUBG, COD, Asphalt etc. You can go for it if you are looking for something with a decent spec and long lasting quality.I'm a samsung user, I am using samsung since last 9+ years and I can claim that samsung gives the best quality product amongst all the other brands except Apple.Camera perfomance is really well as per 48 mp. The only thing is its bit unstable in night time. You may require some extra light for taking pictures in night.

title: It's AWASOME with some cons.
body: Too good too purchase.PROS:1. CAMERA fantastic camera. With 48 Mega Pixels. Low light pictures are better than any other Realme or redmi type Chinese mobile. Even it's good than OPPO.2. PROCESSOR Too good. Better than any other Mobile under Rs 10000.3. Screen : Don't read review of other people. You will never realize it's Oled or else. Screen is good.4. RAM. You will get pure 4GB free RAM with 4GB model. In Realme or Redme you will find  half RAM already full.5. Battery: Battery is too good. I used it full day after full charged. No need to connect to charger in the evening. Charged it next day when you feel free. Even it can play YouTube for half hour with only 2%  battery.6: FM : Fm recording available with good quality.CONS.1 If you play high grafic game for more than 1 hour than it will lag for 10 to 15 second.2 No screen recording. But you can download any application from Playstore or Samsung store.3 Not having magnetic sensor. That's why not good for traveller. It will not show you north direction. You will face difficulty to know the accurate direction of your target.Conclusion : Don't go for any other Mobile brand upto 11k. Go for this SAMSUNG mobile.  M12 or F12.

title: My samsung mobile review after using for a month
body: It is working as per the specifications. The phone is getting strucked in the middle of while continuously the application usage is getting struck for a second,I have to close the application once and again I have to open the particular application It is only drawback I faced in this mobile. Apart from that the sound quality picture quality and video quality all are good as per the cost provided for the mobile. As I purchased this mobile during the Amazon great Indian festival on 7th October. I purchased this mobile through online using card as offer applied and I purchased at 8500 change. It is affordable for normal mobile price  from Samsung brand. If u want to use for normal use it is good mobile. If u want to use for high level games and all it is not Okey.  So you can go for other mobile model as per your need.

title: AVERAGE SAMSUNG PRODUCT
body: Bought it under 10k (black colour) . Average performance overall. You will get charger 15w,charging cable(which is shortjn length) and user manual in the box.No case is provided in the box recommended to buy one with it. Body is made of plastic which is of low quality, black one looks decent compare to other colours.Pros:1.Battery life is awesome(2 day backup for me on moderate usage) .2.Display quality is great (better viewing angle)with good audio support.3. There is dedicated micro SD card slot available.4. Type c port.Cons:1. Phone is heavy and thick, you can feel the weight  when you are using it. But will get used it after few hours.2. Camera is below Average, not a camera centric phone.3. OS is laggy, you can feel it sometimes when you are using it. Samsung One UI is great but it makes it laggy.4. Can't do any heavy gaming, average game can be possible.5. Battery takes time to charge, but drains really slow. Lasted 2 days in full recharge. More than 2 hours to charge fully.Overall this phone is good for media consumption only.

body: The features offered by this device at the price range are fabulous. There is no lag during the usage. The display is good for watching youtube, netflix etc. The camera is decent w.r.t. the price at which you get it. For gaming, it is optimized for no lag.Perfect optimized performance at this price range. Call quality and speakers are good enough.

title: Good for the price but unwanted apps installed without permissions

Battery is awesome,it lasts for 9 hour continuous video Play and 1.5 day nirmal use.15W charger charges fast.Fingerprint on side is fast and it's easy to unlock then phone on table. Other phones have fingerprint at back side which is useless.Camera quality isnt that good but it's okay.Only problem is Samsung installs unwanted apps without permission. It installed the paisabazaar app without my permission. The "paisabazaar" and "policybazaar" are the biggest scammers in India.

title: Writing this post after using the phone for one week

Overall for the price of 10k (i got 2k discount from amazon and 1k for using icici card) this is an excellent product from Samsung. Also to mention the Android v11 is loaded...
