title: Good mid-budget phone for elderly people
body: I had bought this phone for my father-in-law. He is pretty satisfied with the performance. Battery life is amazing for him (he does not use phone much, apart from occasional calling and receiving calls, and checking whatsapp twice daily), and he is getting 3-3.5 days of battery-life after one full charge.We know that we can get better phones from other brands in this range, but for elderly, the ease of use of Samsung OneUI is really a tipping factor for deciding on this phone.

title: Best budget phone
body: This model has similar features as other Samsung mobiles. The camera quality is not that great but I don't mind I don't click much pictures anyway, it's not the best camera but it's not that bad. In this price range, I think this is the best deal I've got 6GB RAM, 128 internal memory, expandable up to 1TB with 6000mAH battery and I must say battery life is amazing.Since I trust the brand I always go for Samsung.

title: Not good model from Samsung
body: Unnecessary apps automatically download on their own. We can't control them. Any number of times you uninstall them, again, they will download and install without our role. There are no settings in phone to control them. Very nuisance.Screenshot is not working.  Overall working and performance is not up to mark even for this price level. Some other model from Samsung or other brands or honor are best alternatives.

title: Pathetic Product.
body: Samsung refused to replace screen citing physical damage. As the entire phone is already covered under warranty for any factory defects, there was no need to mention 6 month free screen replacement separately. Had I known this, I would have taken an Insurance. This is clearly a very bad customer experience from a well known brand like samsung. In my eyes, it has already tranished the high brand image for samsung I had. I feel deeply cheated.

title: Battery drain on using internet whether wifi or mobile internet
body: I don't have any games on my phone and no sm app apart from twitter. My phone usage about 98 % comprises of reading my mails and attachments i.e. pdf, doc, xls files etc. and voice calls. Overall my phone usage is less since I work from home mostly from my laptops. But the battery drain is visible within just 3 months of use. The use of mobile internet is also low and I usually work with wifi but the power drain is significant while using internet. I have checked if any app is draining battery but didn't find anything. All this claim of 6000 mah is disappointing. I will probably take my phone to the service centre soon.

title: Amazing battery backup. Last 2 days
body: Amazing blue colour,If you need battery backup phone and have extream use of phone stock market trader like me, go for it without second thought. Superb battery. 100% would last 1.5 or 2 days.Processor is not good enough to handle game. So it's not gaming phone.Screen refresh rate is quite good.I returned my third class POCO F1 in 8k by cashify and bought this one. I got good deal.Camera quality is not good enough.. you need to on 48mp always.

title: Not expected from Samsung
body: The phone is excellent. The call quality is good too. Everything is satisfactory or much better than expected.The major glitch, however, is non-operational USB tethering. It simply doesn‚Äôt work.So if you want a phone that needs to be taken to the service station the minute you switch it on, if you cannot live with a faulty phone or if you must have USB tethering, keep away from this Samsung.

title: 50-50 happy
body: Maine ye cell 17 ko order diya aur 19 ko mujhe recive hua. 3days use karne ke baad mera review-Phone ka Camera aur battery super hai, screen size bhi pocket friendly hai, battery backups almost 2days.Mujhe isme kuch basic kamiyan lagi jo is prise range me nahi hona chahiye, jaise aap net ka speed screen me nahi dekh sakte kyunki setting me option hi nahi hai, isme net bhi slow chal raha hai. Speed show nahi hone se pata hi nahi chalta ki problem cell me hai ya sim network me. Mere likhane cell me idea 4g ka speed achha tha leki. Isme nahi hai. Overall mujhe bahut jyada khushi nahi hui is cell se, jabki maine Samsung ka naam dekh kar m12 purchase kiya. Please Samsung dhyan de.

title: Except for Battery Samsung M12 not worth its price
body: Samsung M12 is not worth it's price due to various shortcomings faced by me. (1) FINGER PRINT SCANNER DOESN'T WORK PROPERLY Position of FP scanner on right side (unlike backside of phone in Samsung A21s & other models) fails FP Scanning. And if mobile has a backcover if the one recommended by Amazon at order stage, then FP scanner will fail you. (2) FACE RECOGNITION ALSO DOESN'T WORK Most of the time Samsung M12 doesn't recognize my face. (Looks it doesn't like my face with which no problem on Samsung A21s). (3) CONTACT PHOTO IN RECENT CALLS FEATURE REMOVED Recent calls appear without Contact Photo. With Recent Call feature in other models it was easier to search & Call numbers from Recent Calls List. (4) STORAGE 4.94 GB of Internal Storage & 7.13 GB of SD Card being shown as Used by OTHER details of which no where. No way available to scan this storage usage & remove unnecessary OTHER consuming Internal & SD Card Storage. (5) NOTIFICATIONS NOT APPEARING ON LOCK SCREEN Despite trying my best Notifications from various apps do not appear on Lock Screen. All settings, including of Lock Screen tried without any success. Think before finalizing Samsung M12.

title: Samsung's trust and Amazon's support is the only reason I bought this product
body: First, Samsung's reliability and second, I ordered this product by combining them with so much emotion that even if I don't want to understand, then I will return it because I will definitely be heard here and when I ordered it, I understood that I have got a very good product and I am very satisfied with it, I gifted it to my brother, he used it regularly, there is no problem of any kind, you guys must also take it

title: Excellent camera, good battery and awesome fingerprint reader
body: M12 is fulfilled my expectations completely, hats off to Samsung. Quality camera and fingerprint reader are best of this range. Especially big battery gives good support for online classes without interruption, totally we are well satisfied with product.

title: Battery, overall performance is really awesome.
body: Good buy within the price  range, this thing is powerfull, the one's looking for performance this is the product, 6 gb ram with 128gb to access with is worthy. The system has variety  of settings to choose from, this might get slow when google drive is being used for contacts and other things as it directly fetches data from drive but there are other settings you can play with and enjoy games at a very good speed.. And the charger is powerful.Recommendation for games: try games from ppsspp emulator.

title: Awesome phone, very long battery life, great feel
body: I am writing this review after 3 days of usage. I have upgraded to this phone from a Redmi 5A. Looks and feel are simply amazing. The usage experience is also superb. The battery life seems to be v v long, when compared to my last phone. Overall, I am very happy and satisfied with this purchase. Seems like a real upgrade from my old Redmi 5A... and, to top it all, Amazon gave me an exchange offer worth Rs. 2500 on my 3 year old Redmi 5A... I have nothing to complain.Last but not the least, the delivery experience was also superb... delivered within 2 days !!! And the delivery guy was also very helpful and patient as it took more than half an hour to reset my old phone before handing it over to him.Overall a 5 star experience... However, I would have loved to give a 6-star for battery life as well as the delivery experience.

title: Best budget phone at this Price
body: Writing this after 4 months if heavy usagePros:-1. Very very big battery life. This battery is so big that you can easily use it for 2days with moderate use.2. Very beautiful screen even though it is LCD. Samsung has not used any cheap screen. You can enjoy your Movies and Web-Series.3. Very good camera ultra wide mode is just so beautiful you don't need panaroma mode in this. Selfie camera is just awesome .4. You even get headphone jack.5. The screen is pretty big best for online classes and binge watching.6. I have played games like BGMI, CODM, NFS with ease.My final opinion is that you should buy this phone if you want to do online classes, play games, or if you want a phone with big battery or if you are a binge watcher. You can download almost 70 movies with ease.

title: Best smartphone at 10000
body: I am a student  .first time I thought  to purchased a smartphone  from.my first salary . I waited for Diwali to get offer price . I searched  all over the internet  to get a budget smartphone  ....but I don't want to compromise  with RAM, ROM ,Battery Mah and must Made in India.....At last I got to know about this smartphone....which gives 6 gb Ram, 128 gb internal storage,  and 6000mah.....I satisfied 100 percent.  I never expected  to get this at just 10000 only from Samsung .....

title: Good one at this price
body: Samsung m12 gives smooth performance. Its 48 mp camera is good but the quality of image it captures is low quality.It has a long battery of 6000 mah. While charging phones heats up. But within a few minutes,it cools down.Overall it is a good phone in 11,000/-Update: 6 may 2021Now its one and half month is over and it has started to heat up  unecessary during charging.üôÑUpdate : 4th July 2021The phone is not taking charging instead it is draining the battery. I does not expected this type of issue with #samsung.

title: Service center is saying it is open piece
body: This is really irritating that I ordered this phone as brand new and within few months now the power button is not working. When I took out to the service center they r saying it is open piece and blaminge that I have opened it. They need money to replace the cap inside the button. Never expected this from Amazon to give me a used piece or Samsung service center is playing a game for money.

title: Was not expecting this.....
body: What would you expect witha battery of the size 5000, that it should be great. Well it okay not that great.I think due to the size of the battery the phone feels quite heavy.Camera: let me say this bluntly that the camera is not great it okiesh time. Didn't expect this from the Samsung company.I know the prize is less but didn't expect the camera to be that bad.If you are going to buy it for battery performance then you may go for it.

title: Good smart budget phone under 10000.
body: My review after receiving mobile..Dont think that samsung phones are hang every time.. the thing is how you dealing with the phone is matters with any brand...Rear/ selfi Camera - awesome performance (daylight conditon) 4.5/5Battery - 4/5Display- 4/5And unexpected features comes within it in this price range bcz it comes with android 11 latest version...90hz refresh rateüëçworking good.Side fingureprint sensor - fastIt support dual volte network...Awesome productThank you samsung for this monster reloaded smart phone...Don't worry guys go for it...

title: Great option for general long term use
body: A great device (on the heavy side) for general usage.Ordered for mom who uses WhatsApp, Facebook, YouTube. Battery lasts for at least 2 days easily.The camera quality is good enough for this price range and good to see the latest Android 11 onboard. 4 years of updates makes it worth the investment for long term usage.

title: Average phone considering price range
body: Average phone considering price range.1. Camera quality: average, no slow motion or time lapse feature available, no zoom when using 48mp. Front camera, below average. Sometimes I take a photo that doesn't get stored, quite annoying.2. Weight: quite heavy, you feel the difference when you take some other phone in your hand.3. screen type: lcd not led or amoled4. Batter life: looks good with normal usage.5. Phone body: back panel looks like of plastic, it would have been better if matelic had been used.6: user interface: sometimes very hard to do something, like taking a screenshot. Could have been given some better option to do that. Also, I use night model, where it gets better into grayscale in night, I can't customize some options like what apps and what type of do not disturb I want, also if had turn it off in some urgent cases I have to go back into settings and then disable it. Not an easy option provided.Face recognition: not fast and accurate.

title: Solid Battery Backup
body: I was looking for solid battery backup phone.. and I found one. M12 is awesome in battery backup,  display is great. Finger print sensor is flawless..Overall a good second phone for my needs..This is going to be a great,Samsung budget phone..I had one incident too , I slipped the phone in a bucket full of water,  I took it out immediately and its working fine...

title: Ok product
body: Overall 3star.. very bulky and a slightly heavier phone. Could work on the bulk and weight of the phone. After a few updates the phone slows down. Samsung needs to work on the performance of the phone. I have been using the phone for 2 months now (6gb ram 128gm rom) and I feel that the performance has slowed in just 2 months. At times there is lag and the phone screen stops responding completely. The pages get stuck and the screen touch also gets weird.Problem areas to sum up1) heavy 2) bulky 3) touch screen is not that great4) slowness of the phoneGood things1) battery life (as of now) 2) camera 3) finger print reader 4) ok phone for basic usage

title: Overall a very good phone at the price
body: The overall look of the phone is good.The features available at this pricing is excellentThe camera quailty is a bit disappointing specially the front camera.There are very few button option and many are missing which is available in the button menuLot of features are also missing in camera.Battery life is very very good listening to music watching movies and day long games .Overall a good phone at the given price rangeHappy to be a SAMSUNG mobile Fan

title: Very Nice phone
body: I purchased it for the 6GB+128GB combination. Though knowing that the processor capacity could be less. But it is indeed a surprise. 6 GB RAM effect is clearly visible apps launch too fast, scrolling too smooth.Have been using it only for 3 days .. but initial feedback is quite good.I should also mention Delivery - superb!. I ordered at night 11pm. next day 11am the phone was with me. Truly.. Kudos to Amazon team - suppliers, delivery and all combined. it is lightning fast.. and really nice.

title: Realistic Review
body: Greetings, This mobile is a PREMIUM variant in budget/Basic smart phone.The main attraction is the exynos Processor (Samsung flag ship Brand) which offers Pristine call Quality and Great Reception.Who can buy it?A person who is looking for a reliable, Long run,Basic smartphone for what's app /Video calls and Working in remote areas where they get weak signals.Recommend for :Working professionals, Sr.Citizens and Kids(Online classes).Not Recommend for Gamers and who spend most of the day with mobile apps

title: New to exynos chipset..but experience is fantastic
body: Iam not a gaming user...so first of all this review is only for normal users...1.Very importantly  the battery stands so strong from its competitors.2.Display though lcd HD+, is so good from all viewing angles.3. I just love the side mounted fingerprint and power button but may be difficult  for some new smartphone users4.camera though  not great, at this price point it stands stronger than  its competitors with all four cameras5.colour variants of phone can be even more optional for users (as of now only three courses two usual colors and one slightly different colors.6.speaker is usual loud but not so great since it's competitors atleast gives surround speakers at this price point. But clarity of sound is great,but bass lovers wouldn't  love these speakers.7.Actually the expectation  and reality  of Samsung  exynos processor  changed my opinion  on their processor...it was great üëç...u will definitely  love it...8. One UI stands apart from all its competitors(especially mi ui ads on mi phones)It was my own experience and review with the phone...If iam wrong at any points peoples can comment me with correct ones so that users buy a better smartphone...Tq

title: Battery backup very good,
body: Battery backup very good. Some features are very helpful, that is tap to wake up & screen off, eye comfort shield, dark mode, Dolby atmos. Transfer massages, contacts, settings, notes, app data are very easy from my old Samsung phone. Overall experience very good.

title: Latest Android 11 device, as expected in all respects.
body: Good quality Samsung phone for general use (6gb ram/128gb). Android 11 out of the box, which is important for security and software compliance/updates for a londer time. Good camera. Excellent battery life (2.5- 3 days with non gaming, sparse content viewing). Better than cheap chinese wannabes in quality and comes with Samsung reliability amd latest Android 11, even though it may be nominally behind in a specification or two..

title: Total Waste of money
body: Product is not working properly got replaced but the issue is still presist and will not be rwolved in near future.I do not that how may buyer are receiving this issue bit I am getting that issue.In phonepe when I enter upi pin that keyboard number are cutting in half size.That is the issue and heating so on..Sound tones are changing automatically.Loud speaker is not working on call. No voice come out in laud speaker on call..:(

title: This price range it's just OK.
body: Got it in Big billion days offer ‚Çπ8500. In this price category the phone is good.Screen and battery are Good.Camera quality is below average.Lots of unwanted applications pre-installed. But you can uninstall some of it.There is no back cover and screen guard in the box.Phone feels little heavier.Its ok for minimal usage. Not for heavy mobile users.

title: A good option to consider in this price range
body: Everything about this phone is good but there are some problems also like processor is bit slow so you will see a very small lag b/w input and output. Too much heavy and width is also too much and it definitely don't looks like 2021 model phone bcz of weight and width of phn specially when technology has so advanced that there are too slim and light weight phns available in the market; it took like phn is from 2015 something. Screen's performance is definitely not upto the mark.I'm a student and I  generally use laptop for much of my work and uses mobile very little, so can't give that much detailed review about everything but yeah I can say one thing that  if you are a student than it will definitely serve the purpose for which you will buy it.

title: Budget Friendly phone by samsung
body: My earlier m31s stopped working suddenly, and in order to have a backup during lockdown purchased this one. It is budget friendly if bought in sale. Same as other phones in size (which are being launched lately). speed and memory in sync. However, camera and finger print scanner a big turn off. Dont go for it if camera / pics are main purpose or you use that often.

title: Good budget phone
body: Got it for 9.5kIt deserves 9k as other brands are selling same phones at such price.Battery backup is the primary reason for buying this.48 MP camera does not give good quality pics. Its just that they have faked by increasing the MP of camera without actually improving image quality.4 camera is useless. Anybody would use only one camera. So its better to give just one camera with good quality rather than to give 4 average cameras.

title: Worst phone ever used
body: It's the worst phone I have ever seen. The build quality is really poor. And speakers of the would will give you a night mare. We can't hear the phone even if it's in your pockets . Speakers are toooo low. I would definitely not recommen this phone. Instead opt for mi or anyother brand where you would get tons of features at this price. I feel regret buying this phone.

title: Average mobile
body: After using this mobile for 2 months I would say its an ordinary mobile for adults who are average users.As i said its an average mobile, good call clarity and user interface.Overall mobile is quite slow (you wont feel like its 4G RAM) even the contact search will take few seconds.Camera is below average 48 mega pixel is not upto the mark (I have used 48 mega pixek redmi note 7 pro) video clarity is very bad, selfie camera is the worst.Macro lens is not clear.Irrespective of the apps you use it will be slow. I don't play games but for sure its not suitable for playing heavy games.Battery is good will come for more than 2.5 days with normal usage. Best for elders.Display is okay.Side mounted finger print sensor is cool.Price is quite high with the above drawbacks.

title: Think once before you choose to buy
body: The phone has good battery better than most other phones.The performance is not upto the mark. Camera doesn‚Äôt look like 48 pixel.Writing 48 pixel camera, 6GB RAM and not experiencing such level of performance based on specs raises doubts on Samsung.Definitely compare with other phones in the before marking a purchase decision

title: Samsung Galaxy M12 is a Grand mobile phone
body: Purchased Samsung Galaxy M12 mobile phone to replace an under preforming mobile. Have been using this phone for the last one month.It is lovely in appearance. Has decent storage capacity, quick data retrieval capability, good Battery life. Camera performance is commendable.I recommend Samsung Galaxy M12 mobile phone for those who are looking for a good mobile phone with decent performance.

title: Sorry Don't buy
body: First time i am faced the problem online purchase, after 10 Days mobile display nit working, the acko insurance party not collecting, he told go to service center and  repair it we can reimbursing the invoice amount, but when i am going to add bank details these is A difficulty in IFSC Code. Till today my mobile not ready and not possible to online Update,

title: Waste of money, Poor battery performance
body: - Phone becomes hot on using for 10 minutes- Poor battery performance, in around 8-10 minutes 1% of battery is consumed while browsing some app (no music or videos were played)- Phone is thick and heavy to hold and it brings pain in fingers and hand (this cannot be blamed as weight is already mentioned in case description)- Never expected such product from Samsung

title: Terrible connectivity and network both mobile data & hotspot & also UI not user-friendly
body: Having trouble with network connection for mobile data access & hotspot also.User interface also not user-friendly. Heavy to handle for prolonged usege.Call recorder toggle switch also not found during call screen buttons.Not even gestures available for emergency torch light on & off. Only available in notification switch panel.Connection issue faced while browsing, YouTube thumbnail not showing, Facebook buffering to play video & scrolling got struck repeatedly and even browser app update also could not complete even after several attempts in playstore.Battery backup performance was also not satisfied even when 6000MAH capacity configuration with 6GB RAM / 128GB STORAGE available.Very embarrassing experience with this new Samsung Galaxy M12 after 3 years smooth usage with my present device(redmi y2).

title: Heavy in weight
body: Mobile have a decent look,For this money range we should not expect high,It will flexible to our parents for youth, you should think twice,Battery life was good, Fingerprint was perfect,Face unlock when light was sufficient it works good,In low light bit late but works.Main drawback was weight of mobile it was bit heavy.Front Camera have decent image in daylight, but we will observe Noise in Image.Something with back Camera.This review is purely my experience with M12 mobile.

title: Timeless Budget Warrior !
body: After usage of 6 months, I'm satisfied with the smartphone. In this budget, this is possibly one of the best offerings. In the world of Android,nowadays Samsung possibly has the best offerings in every price range.Camera is OK enough. At least OK for a 10k phone.Sound quality is loud and clear, with display of good quality. Ganes and consumption of multimedia is enjoyable.Interface is clean and multitasking is smooth. Charging is fast enough. Obviously, the best part is it's massive battery and power usage. With moderate use, it can easily go past 2 days and that is a big plus for people always on the go.In the 10-11k category, this is possibly the best I've used so far. This is a phone for ages to keep.Thanks to Amazon, delivery was in perfect condition.P.S. Before buying, even I was skeptical reading some of the negative reviews. I'm a common user, and my understanding is if you're expecting top of the line performance from a budget phone, then your expectations are to be blamed. Or most of the bad reviews are sponsored ones.If you want top of the line, you gotta spend top of the line.This phone gets the BASICS right, and that is what matters in the long run. And no phone in this category will offer a truly top class camera; even if they do,they will compromise in some other areas. Whereas, M12 with its 8nm efficient structure along with a Trusted Chip Set gets the job done in a smooth manner. Overall, if you want Smooth operations with Reliability, trust Samsung M12.

title: Processing speed  very  slow and internet  working is very bad.
body: Battery life is so good  and camera quality  is average  like 13 mp. Front camera is like 2 mp. Fingerprint reader working without touch finger. When we hold in hand then finger  print reader trust to read any part of hand so it was problem. Processing system is very low. And in this mobile internet speed very slow. And in low network  it's  internet  not worked. Only show processing.

title: All featured Samsung smart phone In this budget .... Pocket friendly
body: It's budget phn with all facilities plus Samsung brand... It's a good choice... You can buy it without doubt if you want a good battery life,  good picture quality,  good camera, also its not lagging in game, good processor and ram with no overheating issue... In this budget it's the best budget and pocket friendly phone. You can't expect more in this budget

title: phone not working
body: i bought this phone from amazon with in 6 months of my purchase , one day it just got heated up in my hand and went blank i went to samsung auth repairs and i was told that its mother board has corrupted and needs to get changed but it is not covered in warranty then what the warrenty is for they asked 9000 to repair it so i have no choice but leave it that way lost 110000 rs will never buy samsung product ever

title: Great phone in a budget range.
body: The phone works rather smoothly has a decent battery life where it lasts the entire day with the charge being at 47% by midnight. The camera performs well for the price, except the camera quality in the dark is grainy, and could be better. There is a weight to it which adds to the build of the phone. There is one speaker grill on the right side of the phone and has excellent audio. Would recommend 10/10

title: Only 2.4ghz band wifi is supported.
body: Except a single band Wifi rest all is fine. I see the product description doesn't say much about its wifi band support. It should have said that it supports only 2.4ghz band.I have no complaints about the others stuffs except that samsung should not bloat the software bundle with so many non essential packages that I can't uninstall.

title: Waste of money. Not expecting from Samsung
body: Dear all. I am writing this review very honestly, may other user get benefitted from this.I used this for 3 weeks and I would say it is clearly waste of your hard earn money .Pro.  Only batteryCons. 1.Heavy  and bulky2. Not adjustable in single hand for selfie4. Camera front. Worst quality all time grainy pic, no beautification5. Back camera also produce worst quality6. Processor is not much for heavy user7. Many time screen lag and hangDear it would be batter you purchase resume, dalne or opportunity in this price segment.If you use zoom app then go for snapdragon process over 700 it will be you option of virtual background in mobile . Media tek processor will not do much.I wnna to back this phone but window close by amazon and I purchased it's glass and guard and covers. So no option left. Pl don't buy this phone. Samsung create waste product in camera  In. This phone.

title: Perfect budget phone for non gamers
body: Fingerprint reader is really good and quickBattery life is good tooCamera quality is decent, since I m not much into photography I am goodProcessor isn't powerful enough to run heavy games , but it don't play heavy games, so this mobile is perfect for meAbsence of secure folder is kinda heartbreaking but nothing that we can't manage

title: No support from Seller
body: Had a mix up Galaxy M21 with M12 . Both comes next to next when you search for M21 . The price of the 6 GB varient of m12 and 4 GB of m21 is also the same . Only problem is M21 is Super amoled , Full HD with latest processor .  No comparison with both . Realized this only on unboxing when the screen looked very ordinary on running the phone .The lag to move from one function to the next is glaring ( even when it is brand new ). Reported this to amazon . They could not help as the seller support page is just a computer generated one which just runs you in circles . Basically no way to contact seller. Only a postal address - in todays world how is it even going to work?  Tried seller website .No reply . I was more than willing to Pay more since it was partly my mistake . Feel cheated with price of a decent phone which starts off slower than my 4 yr old current phone . If only the seller could help .

title: Value for money product
body: Samsung Galaxy M12 can be a good choice for customers who are looking for a Samsung smartphone under Rs 15,000. The smartphone offers a quad-rear camera, HD+ display and is backed by a 6000mAh battery which can easily last for two days. Camera quality is real good.  Fingerprint scanner is fast and responsive sound quality is betterHowever the phone is on the heavier side ,Does not comes with the clear case and headphones and you might want to add a good screen guard and case .Thank you

title: Not worth the money.
body: Been using this device as a secondary phone for my office purpose. Camera is not good, comes with bloatware every time there is an security update the bloatware apps are reinstalled again, have to delete them again and again.Performance is disappointing, the phone is slow.Display is Ok but there is a noticeable light leak from below panel visible on screen.Device is very heavy, thick and long in length making it hard to use with single hand.I am using it as secondary device, I only use for office apps like MS Teams, Outlook with office admin portal app which gives my company complete root access to device so I am using it only for office communication purpose and I am glad it‚Äôs not my primary device.Save your money go for other device not this one. I would not even recommend this to gift to elderly as this is heavy thick and slow phone.

title: Very poor performance compared to specifications
body: Fingerprint sensor often doesn't respond. Without any reason phone goes in deep sleep mode and go for 3-5 cycle of restarting automatically then start working. Updates are available but not getting installed properly.Called service centers several times but no response received. It appears a faulty product.Camera appears good but if you compare the quality of pic with other models of Samsung it's quality is very average.

title: Non slippery Surfaceüëâüëâ
body: üëÇDo not waist your money on this mobile..üëçMobile is good as secondary usage, non slippery surface is the only good thing.üëçYou can change video quality in apps like u-tube, Amazon prime etc.üëéWorst displayüëéCamera, display and touch quality not goodüëéHeavy weight 220gmNote‚úçÔ∏èGo for another mobile with latest configuration.

title: Preliminary or first impression feedback: Mixed response with some good features.
body: Used for about a month.Battery: and fast charge is good to have. Battery really lasts. But phone is very heavy due to that. Lenth of phone is long too so has a chance to fall if the pocket isn't deep enough.Takes a good 2:30 hours to charge.Key pad is sensitive and great.Touch lock/fingerprint senser isn't upto the mark. I have used honor 7x and their sensor is far better.Screen size is impressive.Camera is good.

title: Don't fall for 90Hz on Budget
body: This phone does it job, but don't fall for 90Hz,It's gimmick, higher refreshing screen are only good if phone works smooth. This Amazon app don't even work properly, while scrolling these apps stutter,And junk! It automatically downloads unnecessary apps and makes phone even slower.Please go by other smart phone in this range.And if you are reading this review in 2021, please never consider phones below 20k for this brand. Go but mi, moto, realme, OPPO, vivo, you will get what you want.

title: A short review........
body: This mobile has got excellent battery backup it's a beast.The display is also best üëç.The camera is ok-ok quality i.e Average quality as if u zoom a little the pixel decreases.The face regonization is very bad it doesn't work at all, you have to move ur face to 1-2 cm distance from Phone than only it works.No complain regarding fingerprint, it's works smoothly üòå.The sound through the speakers are quality sounds üëå.Overall except the face regonization this mobile is perfectüëç.I gifted this mobile to my maa and she is happy with it üòä. Mobile at cost of  only ‚Çπ9999 is perfect for me üëå.

title: Best in this range
body: I have used this for a week now.So here is the detailed reviewPros1. Good battery life3. Fast processing4. Nice sound5. Good fingerprint  scannersCons :1. Average display(video quality sucks)2. Big on hand3. Screen is very soft it will break in a 2-3 fall4.Average camera.Go for m21 2021 edition for better camera.M12 quad can camera is if no use

title: Overall Nice Smartphone!
body: Good Phone in this price segment and overall decent performance but camera is not really good as samsung showcase its true 48 megapixel ,even front camera quality not so good.Battery wise thumbs up!Charging time about 2- 2:30 hrs. 0-100, it will give you 1 day battery backup even after heavy usage.Dual 4G volte with dual standby.Screen quality preety good.It an heavy phone.For business purpose I recommend this phone.Overall 8/10.

title: Battery good, price is good.
body: The honest review could have been 2.5* considering, performance & camera quality, yet I'm giving it 5* because : when i was about to buy this phone i was on a budget and this was the best option for me, a 6/128 model of a top brand at 13500RS was a good deal and my top priority always was battery back and this amused me with its battery back up. If you are looking for a phone with strong battery back up with limited budget? Go for it... Otherwise you'll disappointed.

title: Awesome battery life, satisfactory screen
body: For my use case, a single charge lasts me around 6 days (charge 100% to 40%, after which I recharge again). Actually it should last me more than 10 days I think, if I allow it to drop to 1% before recharging. My use case is: office related video calls, email, WhatsApp, online shopping, connecting to chrome cast and watching YouTube videos on tv, sms, phone calls, reading kindle books, etc. Screen ON time, about an hour or so a day depending on video call duration. I do not play games on my phone. I keep it on battery saving mode, and 60hz screen refresh.Been using the phone for more than a month now. Very satisfied with the performance. Only slight issue was the slightly heavier weight of the phone compared to my previous phone. But I have gotten used to it and it does not bother me at all now.Regarding the screen being non fullHD, I thought it would be something I would notice. Nope, I feel no difference when reading books on kindle. Maybe teenagers with better eyesight will notice, but I definitely cannot.In summary, I‚Äôm very happy with the purchase. I just hope Samsung keeps pushing the updates till at least android 13, and security updates for at least 4 years. That would be perfect.

title: Good phone but front camera is not upto the mark.
body:
The media could not be loaded.

It will lasts upto 2 days if you are doing simple tasks on it.Processor is good.But one thing here is to mention that, if you are looking for good camera quality phone this is not it. title: Thinkü§î
body: First of the phone was a worth purchaseand best budget promise by samsung.For a normal user epecially for middle aged one's and new android experiencing one's it is a better choise, why because of the branded non chinese mobile.Perfomance :1.Camera quality : primary camera is best and give awesome clicks but not impressed in secondary, but i repeat its a budget based handset by samsung..2.Finger print reader: take a few seconds some times, but in a wide range it is fast.3.Battery life : its awesome no word to say...And fast charging 15wA negative portion is weight, its weight is about 221 gm it's heavier i noted this here because, samsung introduced m21 model with more specifications and perfomance carrying the same monster typical battery 6000 mah but weighing only around188gm is very lite weight and easy to handle (remember the prize difference).Overall my conclusion is the product is worth for money. I am completely satisfied, why because i had that much money....So no over expectations, thank you samsung.And especially thankyou Amazon for best service again.

title: U cannot wish to satisfy everyone
body: I bought this phone to last 5years(thus OPPO or Vivo was not an option).........my first phone was Samsung metro.......now it's Samsung galaxy m12..........user interface is good.......the phone barely looses any charge when idle or used via wired earphones..........satisfied till now

title: If you got few extra 1000s, go with upper models
body: Giving 3 stars because1 - It only have got 2.4 ghz wifi card, 5 ghz wifi will not work on this. So if you have modern day fiber internet wifi, chances are it won't probably be compatible with this device.2 - It says 48MP camara but it is not the best camara regarding the specs. I don't understand why it got 4 camaras when other 3 are barley average in terms of quality.If you can have few extra thousands, then go with m30s series.I understand Samsung has to do stuff to do cost cutting and marketing, I also own a m31, that one is better. Also random apps will download from samsung app store until you dont force stop samsung app store.

title: Affordable Phone with Great Features
body: Beyond expectations, an affordable phone in this budget with great features loaded. This phone has the latest android 11 with a great camera, very good battery life, Exynos processor, IPS display with 90Hz, and is well built. This phone is easy to use for gaming and has a lot of memory to store all your media files and documents. Timely delivered and thanks to Amazon for such fast delivery.

title: heavyweight mobile. camera not good. only brand name none other than.
body: heavyweight mobile. camera not good. only brand name none other than.  other brand like infinix, Asus are too good to use.  good looking but not so special. dont go for famous brands. please use and welcome new brands and functions. if you are really know how to use mobiles then use under 15 k rupees. dont waste a lot of money on costly mobiles.

title: Brick! Not worthy
body: I just bought a brick!The phone is too heavy as brickSlow as snail.Camera quality is worstInterface seems oldPrice : avg.Amazon return policy won't allow you to return that is biggest disadvantage.I insist potential buyers to avoid going for such tempting offers on this device n go for MI /Realme for way better features n feel in this price segment.

title: No dual band wifi, only 2.5ghz, very much disappointed
body: What benefit we will get if I have 6gb or 8gb ram. How come this mobile will not provide dual band wifi, means I am getting low Internet speed with that single band wifi feature. Very much disappointed with this big drawback. Even lower price mobiles are giving this feature but not m12. Samsung smartly avoided by not mentioning this in the product description.

Even though it is Samsung Mobile which is a big brand name but in M12 they have not done a good job as I had expected.

title: Worst Mobile

Yes they have given 6000 mah battery but it takes more than 2 hours to charge fully. And battery does not work like a 6k mah battery.Does not expect this from Samsung as they have huge market nowadays compare to Apple worldwide.

title: Recommended but think again!
body: The phone is great. Good display and UI. Comes with 6000 maH huge battery. Charging is quick but 1 thing that comes as negative is the camera. The camera doesn't seem like 48 MP. It struggles in low light & the Front camera also suffers the same problem. You can certainly go for it if you are OK with below standard camera. Amazon delivery was excellent

title: Just ok for a budget phone not made in china
body: Purchased in June.What I like-Battery power. I charge it only once in 2 days. Being a medium-to- heavy user  it's a big thumbs up.- Storage capacity- Navigation speed- Not made in ChinaWhat I dislike- It's quite heavy!- Eyes hurt within 3 hours. It never happened with any of the phones I have  used so far (more than 10 phones ) . Some of them were really cheap too. I  don't know why this phone makes the eyes hurt. I am not a particular fan of  Eye Comfort Shield feature so this is a big minus point for me.- Camera here truly is just an accessory. Well, anyway, I didn't buy this phone  for cameras, my expectations were already low but the quality of pics are  even lower than what I expected.- Screen resolution.If you have other phones and want a budget secondary phone not made in China this one is good enough. I was sceptical about the performance of an Exynos processor , never used one before, but it seems alright so far.

title: Battery & Multimedia Monstar
body: I baught this phone but after 2-3days use i fill like its Display having some flickering issue then I Raised a Complaint. Then a Technician visited my phone and told me everything is fine. Them after 4-5 days later I again Feel Like Choppy And lagging problm and The Flickering issue. Then I called customer service they told me its out of replacement Policy. But when I insisted them they agreed to replace It. Now I am satisfied With the phone.Phone is smooth ( Just go in developer options and Set the animation scale to 0.5x Them Everything will be smooth)Battery is Monstar (6000MAH)Display have TFT panel But Samsung is Alasy winner in display department.Te display shows Deep Black not as Samoled panel but Better then (MI,Realme,oppo,vivo)Phone is Heavy but manageable.Cameras Are Decent enough For te Price range.I bought it for 8550/-I am happy üòä with the device now.Now lets see What happen.I am writing the review After 15 days.Please check tw device Before buying.Thank You.

title: Good Budget phone if not best

title: Couldn't meet my expectations
body: I expected a lot about samsung mobiles in this price segment, but after buying it I totally regret myself.. But as a reviewer, I would like to post the pros and cons that I observed in this mobile..Pros:-1. Long Battery Life.2. Advanced features which are only available in Samsung ecosystem (like "do not disturb while in driving" etc.,)3. Can fastly unlock the phone using Fingerprint scanner.Cons:-1. Total Weight of Mobile.2. Camera quality is not seems like a 48MP Cam.3. Display quality is also not good.4. Face unlock is just an useless feature in this mobile.5. Last but not least, the worst thing is the processor. A walking turtle would be better than the performance speed of this processor..If anybody like to buy a mobile in this price range, just go with either Redmi or Realme.. Those brands will really satisfy you a lot (I were a Redmi user and I fully satisfied with the features, that's why I recommended this brand). üëç

The speed is also good, works well for daily usage. The camera is not the best does not feel like 48 MP. The 6.5" display is very impressive. Gives amazing video and audio quality.Overall I liked this one and highly recommend to buy it.

title: Basic knox secured Samsung phone
body: Decent phone at 9,000 (after bank offers). The processor and display are not upto the standard. But given that this phone has knox security, I have little to complain about. This phone is strictly for old people who just needs a secure phone for day to day usage like messaging, calling, etc. Not recommended for any user who wants to do a lot of multitasking or gaming.

title: Value for Money‚úå
body: I buy this phone on Diwali offer for Rs9500 on 30 Oct 2021.For this price the phone is worthy enough..Now it been nearly 20days of usage..Pros..1.Best Battery life even in heavy usage it hold for a day its amazing...2.Rear Camera Shows the real face and color tone without additional filters in that way I love it..3.Display more than enough..90Hz Awesome4.Fastest FingerPrint Reader in this segmentCons...1.Front Camera not too bad as well as not good too..average for selfie lovers..but for me I like this one...Note it Mainlyüëáüëá2.Processor or something make the phone lag...lag in popup the keyboard itself is not good....if it is a bug need fix immediately..3.Asking Updates for all the apps... may be it because of the phone launch day it was March 2021..I'm a Samsung fan So for me it is a better option for this rate..if you love Samsung buy it without the second thought...Apart all of the above the best phone for daily moderate users...OK for heavy usage(For Hours)...

title: Not so great. Regret my purchase
body: I bought this for my mother. I ll just list what I don't like.1. Too heavy. Don't buy this for old people2. Camera is shaky and output is not great. I don't know why they have given four cameras.3. Too much of useless Samsung apps and galaxy items interrupting in between. I cannot able to disable these.

title: Not as expected
body: Samsung is cheating people with marketing big numbers for a product. All the specifications are just on paper.In reality, every specification is just sub-par.Camera quality is same as what you see in phones that released in 2012-2013, like Galaxy Grand 2.Battery is advertised as 6000mAh, but in actual, it gives the same result as a 3000mAh battery.Processor is just utter crap.Seeing a phone for the first where the initial setup itself lags like anything.Display quality feels same as resistive touch era phones.Screen shows bleeding symptoms.I wish they had a return policy instead of replacement.

title: Kam daam main bada dhamaka
body: This hand phone is perfect for those who want it for day to day use with decent gaming experience also security wise it is good one, actually before purchasing this phone i had watched so many videos in YouTube and amzon, After using it for some days I think it is very good for an average person but if you want to compare this phone with some other devices i think that you should avoid to buy this mobile phone also, if you have been using some high end devices for some times then also you should think before purchasing this phone. In my personal opinion i think this is very good phone with excellent camera and battery life, also performance wise it is good for day to day use. Itne kam daam mai Samsung ka bharosa aur NonChinese device wo bhi made in India. So go for it I'm sure this phone will not disappoint you.

title: Do not Buy
body: Device is Heavy.Camera Quality is very poor.Screen Quality is very poor compare to othwr device in market.Fast charging is OkBattery backup is also Ok.I would recommend try other device in the same segment Like Redmi, Mi, Poco.

title: Average
body: I had a lot of doubts before purchase on seeing the negative reviews lying here and there but my experience with the Samsung m12 was really exciting. It has good battery backup, the display, even though 720p is not bad to look at, screen brightness is optimum. RAM management is good for day to day apps. Haven't found any lags.  Haven't tried playing any games on it. The battery last for 2 days on normal usage and 1 day on heavy usage and takes about 3hrs to fully charge.  Over all it is a great phone. The true monster. Update: After using it for nearly 6 months I'm facing proximity sensor issue, which I found is common in midrange samsung devices because of which I'm planning to change the phone and never am I going for another Samsung device. There are minor stutters here and there even while using light apps like YouTube. The battery life is still awesome.

title: Not Good, Not Bad
body: Hey so this is an honest review from my side. I thought Samsung phone would be great for my dad but it isn't so great. The battery life isn't good. Once the battery goes below 50% it drains really fast. Talking about camera quality, it isn't as good as expected. The pictures look grainy.. finger print reader doesn't accepts your finger sometimes, and if you put a cover on your phone then its even harder to use the finger print reader. This phone has good features but ya if I talk about the price it was good for 11k but not perfect!

title: Affordable, Battery lasting, and a Camera Gem!
body: Pros:Great Battery Life. Upto 2 days minimum.Great Camera.Superior smoothness in usability4GB RAM for multitasking.Built and feel of the phone.I use the phone primarily for clicking product photos for my website, and business calls. On a personal level, a powerful battery and camera saves me time and gives me a hassle free experience.  I use all sorts of video and image editing apps that requires a lot of ram usage and the phone has never crashed so far. Also does well for gaming. Hard core gaming may be sluggish. But for the price perspective, this phone is all you ever need.Cons:Face Detection  for unlocking ‚Äî takes atleast 3 seconds to react. The fingerprint sensor is comparatively faster. But both is a little annoying at times.

title: Value for money smartphone
body: While Samsung boasts about the 48MP camera, the picture quality is not up to the mark. I was looking for a smartphone for my mother with a price range of 9-11 k and was confused between Resmi 9 series and Samsung M12. I finally decided to go for samsung since it has a good resale value. The battery life is just amazing, since my mom uses the phone for basic functions like calls, watching videos on youtube and social media, the battery lasts easily for 3 days on a full charge

title: Great Phone!
body: Pros:*On the internet, some found the phone heavy a little bit, but for me, it looked like a sturdy mobile*Great Rear camera quality, Good front camera quality*Ultra quick fingerprint sensor*Descent battery life indeed, suggest you use the phone mildly and charge the battery only up to 85-95% for at least 1 week. I use the phone mostly for YouTube and social media and with that using its battery last for about 2.5 - 3 days or sometimes 3.5 days as wellCons:*Face Recognition is slow, but you won't need that if you use fingerprint*Not meant for high-end gaming cause sometimes frame dropsBtw purchased the phone for Rs 9499

title: Go for other option
body: Not up to the mark too many cons1)phone ram management is not good it hangs too much 90hz screen is only for show whenever u set screen at 90hz its start hamging2) VGA camera is better than this 48megapixal camera3)when i start mobile and setup it hang and restart more than 2 time so i will suggest  dongo for this phone

title: Worst processor ever in a Samsung phone !!
body: I bought this smartphone for my mother as I knew there would be no large applications used, so the phone would not need much processing. But this phone started to freeze and lag even when applications of size 10 -15 MB were installed. I have been a loyal Samsung customer for nearly 10 years, but now it's time to move on I think.I will not suggest this phone to anyone. You can get far better phones at this same cost.

title: Good phone within this budget
body: Fingerprint reader ,battery life and camera are üëçgood as compare to others within this budget. My decision was very clear before purchasing that I would buy only phone within ‚Çπ13000 so I purchased and in my opinion  if ones budget is same then go ahead don't thing and read negative  review

title: Solid overall performer
body: The fingerprint reader is placed at an ideal location and works without fail. The battery life is really good even though it takes a long time to charge so in all good. camera quality of the primary camera is good for everyday use. The design of the phone is such that it does not wobble and there are no protruding camera. The built quality feels solid. No fingerprint smudges.I have experienced some jitters but nothing to complain about. Calling over WiFi facility works very good and the earpiece quality is decent. No issues with proximity sensor. Though it lacks the bells and whistles of its competitors, it does well. There is nothing extraordinary to write about, but it is actually good as there are nothing extremely negative to write about. Buy it and it will work as its supposed to. Also trusting on Samsung brand name for data privacy.

title: Great budget smartphone from Samsung
body: Great budget smartphone from Samsung.Got a bit worried after reading all the negative reviews about the phone's display and camera but they didn't fail me or Samsung. Great battery life and display looks awesome. Camera is normal; neither extremely extraordinary nor disappointing. Overall camera is satisfactory at this price. RAM and Processor give very smooth performance. Don't get worry about the bullshit negative reviews (by people who want gold at the price of brass).  Go for it.

title: Audio Output Too Low
body: I have gone through many reviews for this phone. But, I've not seen anyone talking about sound quality. Maybe their handsets are working absolutely fine.. Maybe my particular handset is troublesome. Anyways, since I got the phone on my hand, I couldn't explore as much as I should but overall my experience with Samsung is not up to the mark. I purchased Samsung's phone hoping to get some amazing performance which the company and other reviewers (mainly YouTube reviewers) claim.I am not that technically sound person to digest every single term the phone companies (manufacturers) use these days. Still, I've gathered a little bit of knowledge and experience after using various smartphones over the long 11-12 years.I got this model (Galaxy M12) exchanged with Redmi 8A Dual which was not that much worse.. The sound was pretty loud be it media sound, ringtones, call sound, etc.Frankly speaking, I've not checked gaming, camera and other features the way I did with sound quality. I'd recommend experience yourself before you buy this phone if at all possible.

title: It's a meh phone
body: Good phone for the price. The responsiveness of the screen to touch is a little wanting. Battery not as good as expected, lasts for about a day and a half with moderate usage.  Camera is great but it's a pain to select and toggle through the settings. Really have to look hard to realise it is a high resolution image. My other purchase is an M12 which feels really premium compared to this phone. The price difference at time of purchase was only 2k.

title: A very poor quality camera, memory
body: Firstly amazon cc is very inefficient in handling my queries, series of wrong communication from chat support, phone support. My email is not yet answered since 8 days. Now, samsung m12 phone - out of 64gb only 50-52gb is available and remaining 12-13gb occupied by system. Out of 4gb ram 1.8gb approx is occupied by system. Camera quality is very very poor. Phone hangs too much like if i unlock the phone it takes more than 10-15 sec to display clock, navigation icons, notifications panel etc. Phone heats up if we use gdrive, maps, hotspot. Screen and body is very delicate. Plz think much before you go for this. An upset frustrated Amazon cusromer, Sameer!

title: Budgeted phone ever
body: Its a budgeted phone. 6 GB/ 128 GB storage variant is good. Battery backup is awesome. Took 3-3.5 hrs to full charge. Not happy with front camera quality & Awful at night. NO slow motion capturing feature. Rear camera is better in daylight & good at night. Not happy with side touch sensor. Took so many attempts sometimes to unlock. But, overall I am happy using it because navigation sensor, battery backup & performance of phone is good compared with other brands.

title: Outstanding
body: Great product for the money. Thankfully it's not Chinese and there's peace of mind when using banking apps or other apps which warrants security of non Chinese servers. The camera to screen everything is as good it can get for the money and software is way above what the Chinese offers.

title: Little heavy
body: After use of one month i can say,Excellent battery life, sound quality is good, Its not easy to handle due to its heavyness but it can be bcos of 6000mah battery. Fingerprint sensor is good. Camera quality is not good as expected from 48 mega pixels. Front camera is not good at all. But overall experience till now is very Good. Want to give 5star but one star less due to its camera and Handling.

title: Good but not the best, expect much more from Samsung
body: Samsung camera is supposed to be far better than Lyf Wind, regretably it is on par. You could sell this lower end of the product range for may be 7000 or max 7500. Beats many local brands yet not satisfactory. Giving a 4 starFeed back: Sold my old Wind Lyf phone for Rs 1350 to a small dealer. Rs 450 exchange value is not fair at all.

title: Absolutely  satisfied  with the modile
body: like you I have searched the reviews for this mobile..just keep this two things in your mind while you choose to buy this mobile.1. If you are a low range mobile user and u trying to buy high range mobile then this is the perfect mobile with exotic features and to perfect price like 10500.2. If you are a high range user mobile price of above 15000 then this will be little low campares to that m12 but m12 gives it own best Performances.You can't  compare this mobile 10500rps  to the mobiles above 15000 because  if you put plus money then it comes with  more features  that's the difference..so you must compare the features with price tags then scroll to the reviews  for performance of the mobile  like you and me! Conclusion:-  Review is only for this mobile so...this kind a features with this price is absolutely  worth it. Performance  was damn good of every features and last Final finger print sensor is a exotic feature in this mobile the it works is like DAMN GIRL!Thank you.

title: Overall not bad phone.
body: I have just picked it up in budget category for day to day needs, well I'm not disappointed with my choice it's a great package to offer at this price point keeping my needs in mind.However the phone is very sluggish in response, if you're looking for performance from this phone kindly stay away it will disappoint you.Hope my review helps prospective buyers.

title: It's Ok
body: After using since 5 days......1. 90Hz display really smooth2. Camera quality little better if you select 48M camera setting . Not really good one for photography.3.battery backup is too good, as I am not a gamer4. Too heavy to carry ...After using with back cover it feels almost 500 GM to me5. Voice clarity is really good.6. 4G speed is awesome.7. Overaally it's a nice phone ......

title: Budget Phone
body: Bought this phone a week ago.Budget Phone for people who need a good smart phone at lower rate with good battery backup of 6000mah.Phone is not very heavy, screen is bigger which is good for watching movies/videos.Negative: keypad is not showing fully when using upi mobile app.Otherwise phone is good.Will write more reviews after using it for some more time

title: After 1 week of use
body: This product is fantastic for this price! I tested the Battery life and for a heavy user, it can easily last you and day or a day and a half. And for a light user, it can last you 2 - 3 days! Also, the cameras are decent, the front camera is ok in low light or in some cases indoor lighting, but the front camera is pretty good! I have seen phones with these exact same features for double the price! The screen is respectable it's not pixely, but it's not the best ofc. The screen is pretty smooth, its 90hz is really nice and smooth. Gaming on this phone is ok. I mean like I told you the battery can last you a long time, and the same thing applies to gaming now ofc the battery will run out faster but not significantly faster. Playing the actual game its self is decent only the VERY high-powered games is a bit laggy on this phone but most of the games work smoothly. I would give this phone a 4 star just because the front camera could have been better.

title: Mobile quality is average
body: 1) Look and feel of the mobile is good but little heavier due to 6000 mAH battery.2) Camera quality is good but slow - takes more time to save the picture.3) Fingerprint reader is good.4) Overall performance is slower.5) Battery support - 2 days under normal use.

title: Snapshot feature missing. No guesture for snapshot.
body: It got deliver on 14th April. After using few days I find my moto phone was better in features. I am not able to take screenshot using power button + vol down button. It always show Power off + restart + emergency.Motion and guestures features are limited compare to moto. No option for 3 finger touch screen shot or palm slide screenshot. Rest is ok. Not much imprressed.

title: A budget friendly MONSTER!!!!!!!!!!!
body: I ordered it on 2nd of may and got it on 5th of may. I am pretty much with which which the phone comes. This phone has really exceeded a lot of expectations regarding the features that its loaded with. But the only thing with which  I am disappointed with is its sizeü§î, its quiet "fat"üòÖto say. But really.... I am astonished with its battery backup. It's a huge for phones in this price range. It comes with 6000mah battery which I felt, a #monster preciselyüò≥. The camera....OMG!!!!!its just too good. It comes with 84mp quad camera . It has a 10x zoom, which is super clear. The fingerprint reader is mounted on the side,down the volume button. It's too awesome. It  senses the print, even on a thin plastic sheet is placed on it. Other than all this , to say, it a great budget friendly and a must buy on the other hand. title: It's OK for non regular users.
body: 1. To begin with battery life is pretty good, however it takes little longer to fully charge the phone.2. Front came is pathetic. Rear camera is some how ok for basic usage.3. Fingerprint will work whenever it wants to (not everytime you need it) so remember phone pinlock to be on a safer side.4. Phone got hanged twice within 15 days of normal usage.5. Overall this is a phone for elderly person or for someone who is low to minimal user on a daily basis.

title: Not worth buying
body: Bought this new phone for my mom on 5th Oct.. the day I recieved the phone I had issue with camera quality (checked and confirmed by Amazon technician as well) also faced issue with dialler tone while making call.. there was no sound of the dialler tone.. Amazon replaced and sent me a new phone on the 9th Oct.The new phone had no issue with Camera but issue with dialler tone was still there. I raised the issue with Amazon and they provided me an appropriate solution with amazing service and initiated the refund.I don't think Samsung phones are worth buying at the price range of below 10k.I might prefer going for Realme, MI, Vivo or any other brand over Samsung.

title: A Non Gamers perfect Buy!!
body: I bought this phone for my mother as a secondary phone.Gamingbwas our of question, needed good battery life and goo calling support.Pros -Battery Life is amazing, the phone never heats up. No matter what.It's a sub par processor. But does the normal job. Don't play or install any games on this. Use it for calls, media.One UI is clean. But make sure to delete all the junk apps and disable swing seevices.90Hz is actually visibleCamera bump is non existentThere is WiFi calling, unlime a lot of people suggest.ConsHeavy and thick phone.Stutters when you give it some intense job.No 5GHz WiFiColours aren't the best at this price. Display could have been much better. But won't notice Unless you compare it side by side.For 10k it's a good buy for a light user.If you're a heavy user. Go for Poco M3 or Redmi Note 10 or Micromax In1 if ur budget is 10k.

title: Bad bad bad phone
body: I am writing review after using almost 1month of using this phone, so please take serious before buying this. There is no return policy only replacement available. So think twice.Please dont fall in offer, worst phone ever, always ask for software update.Heavy in weight.Camera Quality poor.Battery life poor.Sound Quality poor.Don't fall in rat race.

title: It is good! But not tooo good! As i expected!
body: I am reviewing this after 2 months of usage! It was good ! It is little heavy compared to other samsung mobile! The battery life is good... But not as worth for 6000mah! I don't play games i just use social media! For social media useage its bit Oke! And the camera! Seriously! 48mp is not that good its Oke! Just oke!! But its totally budget friendly!

title: All good, except fingerprint sensor
body: For its cost, I believe the phone is worth it. Till now, it hasn't shown any problems. Everything works fine. Battery is magnificent. Only problem is the fingerprint sensor. It is on the side on top of the power button. So, the space is very small. Most of the back covers or flip covers cover this fingerprint sensor partially and the device does not unlock.

title: Ear piece speaker not working from day one.
body: The ear piece speaker is not working from day one . I had gifted the phone to a senior citizens. He was using the phone on speaker mode. He did not tell me about it until I found him using speaker to talk. By the time I came to know about the issue 7 days had past. Now no return option available. And I went to samsung authorised service centre there they don't have spares to rectify the problem. So still we are using the phone with speaker on. Did not expect such a quality from a big brand like samsung. Feeling very disappointed.

title: Power efficient and looking
body: All over best phone to buy at this price range.Pros-*UI is too easy to operate very fast based on android one.*Battery üîã is too good giving back-up upto 10 hrs of heavy duty.*Charger is 15w slidely charging fast.*Display is very power efficient & size is good.*No heating issue.*Security review is good*Processor Speed is likely good.*Fingerprint sensor is very fast & side mountedCons-*Camera features are not given like pro mode, slow-motion, fast motion.*Photo quality need to be more advanced.*Device is little bit thik causing of the powerful 6000 mah battery.*Display is not so bright also not so dark & colour are not displaying as expected.*Expected amoled display as Samsung always given in the past.*Speaker sounds like good but volume is not so loud*Weight is little bit heavy.

title: 9/10 Big battery average camera.
body: I got the product delivered super-fastt in just 3 days.. I got my Asus Max Pro M1 exchanged  and I must say it was a terrific  experience . Amazon  gave close to Rs.4500 of my 3 year old phone. However,  I must mention that my old phone had no cracks or dents, so that did not diminish its value and was in a good working condition. Battery life is the best part of this phone, it easily lasts for 2 days with moderate usage and 1 full day if you are a gamer or a heavy user. It takes close to 2¬Ω hrs to charge fully. Coming to the cons, the camera is just average and you will be disappointed if you  buy the phone for the camera. The 90hz is smooth. Overall,  I would give this phone a 9/10.

title: Speaker output is very low. Has bugs out of the box
body: Speaker output is low. You will notice this if you consume media using phone's speakerIt has a bug in touch screen out of the box. Gets fixed with first update.It doesn't have proximity sensorBattery life is the biggest positive. On normal usage I get around 2 days battery life with around 11 hours screen time

title: Ok wala Phone
body: Built quality GoodBattery üîãis Super GoodCamera you can expect more than this from a phone costs 10kPhone is lagging too much of you have more than 15 apps.Very slow performance.I am not a gamer also I don't play any single game. But still the device runs slow.

title: Samsung M12
body: Samsung‚Äôs M12 of a 90Hz screen is a budget phone. the giant 6,000mAh battery and clean UI make up for it to some extent, making the Galaxy M12 a decent buy.The Galaxy M12 feels rigid and offers a firm construction. There is no fingerprint sensor on the back with Samsung choosing instead to integrate it with the power button.good to see Samsung using a USB Type-C port for its affordable devices, and that is present at the bottom alongside the 3.5mm headphone jack and speaker grille. he display on the Galaxy M12 is a 6.5-inch HD+ (720 x 1,600) TFT panel that has a 90Hz adaptive refresh rate. In its price range, the Galaxy M12 appears to be the only phone with a high refresh rate. the display is a standard panel with healthy peak brightness, controlled saturation levels, and minimal colour shift when viewed at an angle. A quad-camera system is present on the Galaxy M12 which comprises a 48MP primary sensor with an f/2.0 aperture, a 5MP secondary ultra-wide lens with a massive 123-degree field of view, a 2MP depth, and a 2MP macro sensor. As far as budget phones go, the Galaxy M12 does a decent job of capturing details  At night, the camera is a bit inconsistent and a slight shake can induce blurriness in the shots. I keep my expectations about low-light photography in check from a lot of budget phones, but the M12 is above average and good. Lastly, you get a beefy 6,000mAh battery that is very likely going to last you two days on moderate usage.

title: good
body: after using the phone almost 4 months1. phone is not super fast what company is claiming infact it is slow sometimes.2. If fully charged battery stays 24 to 30 hours even after heavy use but problem is with the time taken for the battery charging is toooo long. so people having busy schedule will always face low in battery, and searching for where to charge ü§î. 15 amp charger kaun deta hain re Samsung?3. M series has bad reputation for software essue but I Did not faced yet except Bluetooth sometimes turned off automatically while listening music.Overall price has dropped 1000 Rs now. I bought it at 10500 Rs. You can buy it, sexy looks. works well.

title: Good quality & built phone in a budget
body: Honestly the phone deserves a rating of 4.5 (deduction 0.5 due to certain minuses of missings like absence of dual band etc)...Overall, the phone feels extremely premium to use with high refresh rate, reasonably fast & zappy processor, good primary camera etc.Another major factor to consider is that the phone is extremely well built & the weight is very evenly distributed....

title: Super buy
body: Face recognition is slow. otherwise the phone is super awesome. My 4 months old iPhone se 2020 ran into some hardware issues, due to pandemic I couldn't service it. So I brought this m12 phone, just to be in budget for obvious reason. This phone is under 9999 and if your expecting performance similar to a 40k, then your review needs a think over. This phone exactly does or does more than what it's priced. If you are low budget and want more out of it with some limitations, go for it.

title: Doesn't recognize 5G bandwidth of wifi
body: Such a modern phone but doesn't recognize 5G bandwidth of wifi. Fingerprint reader on lock button is in a very wrongfully place. Phone locks and unlocks because of it. So now have to register a different finger for unlocking and use different finger for locking the phone.

title: Super one..
body: If you are looking mobile at this rate ....the best choice is this m12....really loved its features..prons:1)battery life 6000mah it would come for 1 1/2 day with average use2)display was really amazing really loved this huge display..colour,sound was simple good3)camera are nice i took some good shots from them4)it comes with nice os operator +andriod 11.0 v is good in it..5)Soft touch and fringer print and face detection sensor also works well.cons:1)The processor can be better...this processor is good for average usage and average graphics games2)The weight is some what more....finally good phone for this cost compared to all other phone at this range...

title: Disappointed with speaker volume
body: I read reviews about the battery life and camera and went for this phone. Its good on all aspects except the speaker volume. Even the call ringtone is low on volume. If you work in noisy environment then this phone won't suit you. Even listening to songs on speaker is low on volume. This is a compromise you have to make.

title: Great user experience
body: Using Samsung smartphone after many years. But have to admit samsung smartphones improved a lot as compared to TouchWiz days. Performance, camera are very good on this device. Battery life excellent. All features functions as intended to be. No bugs in software. User experience is really great. Delighted with this purchase.

body: and the most imp thing when u give it in service the just take money and do nothing I m fed up of this phone, now this phone is a liability on me the camera quality is not good at all for close range it's ok but for distance it's 3rd classI suggest u guys never buy this phone.

title: Disappointed with M12 overall performance
body: It's been 20 days since I'm using my Samsung M12. There are so many difficulties I'm facing since then. It's  honestly not been a good experience so far. 2nd slot of the sim doesn't work most of the time, so can't make requent outgoing calls from the same. Every now and then, I've to Turn Off & On the Sim2 slot, then only it works fine. Also camera quality is pathetic. One major problem is with the fingerprint sensor. For 1st 10 days, it was working superb, but now the fingerprint  sensor mostly fails in recognising & opening the phone. Also, sometime my phone lags while working on multiple apps. Overall I'm very disappointed.Only 2 pros of this phone: Low budget & superb battery backup.

title: Got used and seal opened product
body: I ordered samsung galaxy m12 in blue color. I got used product with open seal. I called the Amazon and they agreed to return it. Thankfully!What I noticed about this model was it looks cheap.. As back is made up of cheap plastic. It's very heavy, which is not comfortable to use. Camera quality was awful for a 48 megapixel camera (Redmi camera is much better in same pixels) . It's shocking and disappointing.I did use this mobile so can't say anything about performance and battery life. Overall it's a series of disappointments.If you have a low budget(8550 after bank discount) then go for it! Else I recommend micromax in 1 or any other brand with good ratings. It's for normal usage, best for old parents who don't need much Features. Anyone other then that, is a BIG NOO.

title: Best M series phone till date!
