title: Amazing and Affordable!!
body: I'm writing this review from the same phone that I ordered!! An amazing phone in an affordable price.. I ordered the one with 6GB RAM n 128 GB internal storage... overall it's working quite good for me ...it's been 10 days since I got my hands on this phone...fingerprint sensor is working great..battery life is awesome... speakers are working quite good.. n you get quad camera... camera is also pretty nice you just need to adjust the camera settings in order to get good quality pictures... it might not be 'the best' camera for many but it's good guys!!  Overall just go for this without any second thought.... even if you don't like it, Amazon eases your task with its 7 days replacement policy.... so it's not risky to order it online... good delivery service üëçü§ó

title: Camera Quality and Colour +Performance
body: Worst Samsung Mobile Ever. used so many different Samsung mobiles. but M12 is just cheating by Samsung. The camera quality is so poor. It's just a VGA camera, not 48-megapixel screen colors are very low. I have a galaxy j8 its camera is lower than m12 but it is sharp. don't take they will not return the product. worst Samsung phone ever. lost 13500, and amazon service is being poor day by day.

title: NOT bad,
body: You can't really complain about anything at this price point.Still some things to point out:1. Heavy as a brick 212g!! Will take some time to get used to.2. (For power users) Not full one ui. Uses one ui core. Sound Assistant, Good lock, bixby don't work.3. Not Amoled, TFT screen.4. Not a gaming phoneNow the pros:1. 90hz screen feels great2. 48mp camera is awesome, colors are good too.3. Good battery, 1.5 days backup approxOverall satisfied.

title: Awesome phone but faulty adapter
body: I have been using this phone for last 2 months.The battery backup of this phone is too good. It lasts for 2 or 3 days with low usage. Camera is good.The fingerprint sensor responds quickly.In this price range it is worthy. But after 2-3 month adapter stopped working and sparking.

title: Most Affordable Samsung Smartphone with Great Features In This Range
body: This is the best smartphone Samsung has launched in this segment, I received it @12.5k with card offers, and its build quality is Ok, you will get the best features in this range, the camera is gooe, its very smooth in day to day normal use.It has a 6000mAh battery, which almost lasts for around 13-14Hrs in my case. It takes some time in charging, but if we see the battery size, it's normal.cons: you cant use s secure app to secure your  apps and folder, as its not compatible with this phone, and Samsung has compromised in many features.If you dont play heavy games, you can go with this.

title: Good product
body: No doubt product is good but completely disappointed with Amazon because I purchased this in Great Indian Sale @ 10,299/- and next day suddenly product price shows 9,499/-‚Ä¶‚Ä¶

title: Not a good phone in this price range
body: The main reason going for samsung is amoled display but my bad may be I should have read specifications but it's a miss.. blindly went by brand Samsung...two major dissapointments1. There is no amoled screen...the screen is not so good where we get lesser rate MI phones with more good specs.2. There's no dual WiFi band... My wifi is set as 5ghz but this phone doesn't show up..I believe there are cheaper phones in MI and Realme with more specs than this Samsung

title: Awesome phone within 10K budget, a sure shot Redmi killer
body: Simply an amazing smartphone from Samsung within 10k, a rival killer launched. Bought this for my dad and he is extremely satisfied with the performance, camera is decent enough, sound quality is pretty good and battery life is awesome!! Grip is good with the combi finish at the back. On the cons, a bit on the heavier side and slightly thicker compared to its rivals, but definitely not a deal breaker. With 90 Hz refresh rate, the pros surely weigh high over the cons, just go for it.

title: Thick and Heavy
body: So heavy and thick that I have to be very careful about not dropping it on my face when in bed. Screen res is low and pixels can be seen on the screen. Flash light left On on level 5 can burn the phone. More than usual typos on the keyboard while texting or entering OTPs. Fingerprint sensor is super fast and battery back up is great.

title: The phone keeps showing a black screen with logo
body: The phone keeps showing a black screen with logo. And doesn't allow to use the phone even after multiple  tapping on screen or trying to use the fingerprint sensor. It takes almost 2-5 minutes for it to allow to use the phone. The issue persists while tge phone is in use or even when left idle. Hence the battery keeps draining. I tried restarting the phone but it didn't help. But the worst of all was that I switched off the phone, but the phone just turned on on its own. So their switch off doesn't work.

title: Not worth...don't have enough basic features...6000 mah I doubt it

But I have worst experience with Samsung Galaxy M12 as its screen picture and camera quality are third class. Please do not buy this if camera is important for you.It cannot detect wifi from exactly the same location from where my Samsung On7 Pro can, Redmi 9 can and all others can. Please note that M21 and M12 have network detecting issue.

title: Good phone
body: The phone is very goodBattery life is goodCamera is very goodTechnology is goodSamsung service is good for this good phoneOverall it a nice phone  but display quality is very poor  so this phone is good for in its price list.

title: Phone to achcha hai but‚Ä¶.
body: Phone to achcha hai. Main Sri lanka se, par India se mangvaya. rs9499 mei to value lagta hai. Lkn camera 48 hone par b dooor ke fotos ki pictures quality to theek nh. But selfie aur normal distance ke fotos  to theek hai. Meine ise online classes ke liye kharida. So iske liye theek laga. Face ID to andhere me kaam nhi karta. Battery bhi theek hai. Abhi 5dinon se classes ke lie use kia. Aur kya kahun? Amazon me jo b details dekha use dekh kar kharida. Ummid thodi si thi ki camera ke bare me. Iske alawa overall theek hai.

title: Good buy at this price. Strong and appealing design.
body: It's just 2 days of buying this phone so overall review is not possible. Few things which I want to tell about the phone. It looks and gives feeling of strong built. It's slightly heavier (though I like such phones). Battery backup is superb. Camera quality is good at this price option, front camera has noise in pictures which is common in low budget phones. Display and sound is also justifying the price. With smooth touchscreen it's overall a good budget phone which gives you a feeling of premium built and fair quality. My reason to buy this phone was the strong built quality and simple yet good design (it does not slip from hands). I got instant discount of 1000/- on buying it with HDFC card.

title: Don't buy this phone
body: The camera is of very poor quality.Screen disply quality is not good as redmi phone don't buy this phone.I will never purchase any Samsung phone in future.Samsung is only doing marketing launching new products every day but quality of the product are very poor.I replaced the redi phone if you used the redimi phone you will never satisfied with Samsung.

title: Pathetic Product from Samsung
body: I had bought this phone for my mom and it had severe call quality issues from the beginning and within 6 months of using it the fingerprint stopped working. I checked with the service centre and they told me that the phone had liquid damage although it never had contact with water or rain. Stay away from this garbage.

title: Camera quality. Donn't waste your money on M12
body: Total waste of money. Worst camera quality. Front camera is not even like like 1 megapixel camera. If you like to take even a single selfi, then don't go for it. Back camera is also not at all good. My old Samsung phones are far better than this one. Once you buy you have to live with it. So, don't waste your money on this M12

title: Nice product
body: Nice product with in the price range with better battery back up. Camera quality is good..The only bad thing I observed is that wifi is getting connected 2.5ghz bandwidth networks but not getting connected for 5ghz higher bandwidth networks.. Otherwise I would have given 5.

title: It seems Samsung  has delivered  what they have been promoting in Galaxy M12
body: I got this phone for my second contact number as my primary handset  battery  runs out very fast and I usually have very long days. But this phone's battery  really  amazed me . It's only 3.5 days I am using  but I can tell you that the battery  backup  is really  good . My first full charge ran for full 3 days with moderate usage. Looks good . UI is simple with Android 11.  Weight and grip is good . Screen is responsive . Haven't faced a real show stopper as of yet . Initial opinion is full value for money for those who are looking for descent  phone with a very good battery  life.

title: Wonderful phone for so low cost
body: Wonderful phone for the provided price. This was bought for my father .I was using one plus 7 pro and due to repair I was forced to use this phone for a week and to be honest other than camera I was more than satisfied with this mobile and its performance

title: Not for those in the age group 12-60
body: It is a phone suitable for kids or those who use phone only to make calls and watch videos in youtube. phone is of basic specs and cannot be used for multitasking.it can be used for basic things. nothing more.

title: Not bad at these price

Like only calls msgs and social networks chatting.If you want camera good means don't buy this phone.Screen resolution is less due to that HD videos were not in original some what blur or like below HD.

title: Poor battery
body: Bad product heavy weight if you use one plus. I bought this for mailing and what's app so it's working ok. At this price it's a quality product but don't expect performance like one plus or high priced phones. Battery life doesn't seems to perform like 6000 it's bad

title: Bang for a Buck
body: People who are judging this without realizing it's price needs to calm down. I bought this for my cousin during Great Indian Festival at Rs. 8600. Excellent product, Clean Samsung UI which is the best in the world, 90 Hz refresh rate which is working fine without any lag, Battery backup is real good. People who are saying camera needs improvement, they are not gonna give you Flagship level camera in the phone which is less than 10000 Rs. If you want cleaner UI, you can definitely buy this. & it's stupidity to judge a phone by Gaming performance. This phone is a daily driver & not a gaming device.

title: Excellent product within this price range. Battery back up is unimaginable .
body: Samsung Galaxy M12 is an excellent handset. I am writing this review after of using the mobile for three weeks. The battery back up is unimaginable . Once it gets fully charged it runs for around 40 hours with frequent usage of internet. This set consists every unique feature that Samsung offers. The camera is good but not excellent. Nevertheless the sound of loudspeaker is little down. That is to say if the volume is not highest then it becomes a bit hard to listen.To conclude i would say that the configuration which this handset consists within this price range is just beyond imagination. This is an excellent handset Samsung launched.

title: Performs much better than was expected after reading the reviews.
body: Camera quality is good if compared to other phones in this range. Phone feels really fast, thanks to the 90Hz screen and 6gb RAM with a fast processor. I bought in under exchange offer for 10,000 ( 6gb variant ) and I am quite satisfied with my purchase. Go for it if you are tight on a budget yet want a phone with good specs. Much better than similar budget Chinese phones. But note that front camera could have been better, although it is 8mp but still gives grainy images. Phone was delivered in perfectly new condition.

title: Weak point

title: Very basic phone. Not as good as other phones in the market at this price range

There are much better phones in the market at this price range.

title: Excellent smartphone in this price.

title: Truly Worth to Buy This Reloaded Monster - Samsung M12
body: Samsung is truly a Monster with 6000 mAh battery with 8 nm processor. 128 GB Internal memory is really good to have along with 6 gb RAM where the games r loading very smoothly. True 48 Mp quad camera is truly wise to capture the photos. The phone is very slim and 90 hz refresh rate is really awesome. 16.55 cm infinity V display is cool. In total this mobile is one of the best to have at this range of prices. Moreover the backside of the phone is having a matte finish which is very good and not slippery.

Finger print reader is ok.

title: Just another smartphone under 10k. Nothing special.

title: Excellent Samsung M12

title: 6gb and 128gb using for 2 weeks
body: Actually I am a fan of samsung.I brought this variant with 11k @ diwali offer.I thought to buy other mobile instead of Samsung in this price where I can get additional features, but surprisingly samshng m12 made me feel good after buying this phone.Main thing is performance no lag even I am playing asphalt 9, Ram management is super and samsung UI  is great experience  as you can see in high end mobiles.Charging is fast and long last.Disappointed thing is only üì∑.Totally I am üòä with this üì± in this price Range.Recommended and for it, As of now 6gb varaint is about 14k wait for drop 11k and proceed.

title: Delivers at its price - Highly Recommended.
body: Bought this for my parents and they love it. As I am using A52 myself, I feel M12 delivers at its price range and then some. The fingerprint sensor is fast and accurate. Having 90 Hz Adaptive display is wonderful.Camera is decent as well, with options for Macro (attached) and Wide Angle being good as well. Haven't experienced any lags on medium workloads.Android 11 with updated UI, Smart View, Dolby Atmos, Good Battery Life are some highlights.Very satisfied with the purchase.

title: Great product for a person who doesn't do gaming!!!
body: The battery life is way better than any of the smartphone in the same range and the person is also good as it has 6 gb ram but camera quality can be little bit better and they could have improved the processor. Good thing is that all apps are optimised which is good for the battery life .It's a great product if you are a kind of person who wants a smartphone which has a longer battery life ,a good speed and 90hz refresh rate and who doesn't do gaming in the smartphone.

title: most pathetic purchase ecer
body: i feel like cheated by amazon and samsung its not even a month and my phone stopped working with no reason this was not expected and visited to samsung centre as well but they were saying that only non warranty sets are getting fixed during this lockdown period then i asked them to fixed my set out of warranty (i was ready to pay as well) then they said that your mobile display is need to be change and there is no display available in India for my phone and from that day i am not having any smartphone as i am saving money and trying to bear this pain n loss.amazon hats off to u cheaters.

title: Good value for money
body: Got this as a replecement for my samsung M11. The M12 is way better than M11. Better photo quality, better performance and faster performance. I got the blue phone which looks decent as well. I feel it's worth the 13500 I paid for it.

title: M12 review.
body: The phone received in a day. Thanks Amazon for quick delivery. The phone's display, camera, battery life is good. But one issue I found it. Recently I realize it that once I receive incoming call am not able hear it for couple of minutes / sometimes no voice heard from other side and finally I need to close the call ....initially I thought this issue should be from sender phone but now I realize it is in my phone...it appears that either there is problem in my phone or in model. Samsung and Amazon to look into this issue & replace it with good phone on immediate  basis.

title: Mobile not good
body: Mobile lene k 15 din baad hi.. Uske loudspeaker m problem hone lgi... Aur 5-6 din baad hanging problem hone lgi....

title: Good build and Design
body: Pros:1. Entry level budget smart phone2. Battery levels are amazing3. 90Hz refresh is plusCons:1. Finger print sensor does not picks up elderly person's finger2. Face lock is also not up to the mark3. Brightness levels of the display are not up to the mark when compared to other 12k to 15k M series budget phones

title: Nice one
body: The phone is good. Of course it justifies its price range. But this phone has a low audio output,so putting a speaker during call,or while playing other media files, the sound is not very high even when kept at full volume. Other than that, the phone is great.

title: Good for consuming data not for creators.
body: After 1 month use, some serious sensors are missing which will make google maps almost useless on the phone. Camera quality is good only for day time that too depends on mood of the camera. Sluggish phone you can see phone saving photo even after quiting the camera app. Serious processor problems. I bought 6/128 variant and felt sorry for whoever bought 4 gig version. Good for minimal users and for saving tonns of photos via apps but not from the phone's camera. BGIM was surprisingly good on the phone thanks to its large screen. Also good for online classes and OTT viewers.

title: Worth buying you will not regret.. üëçüëç
body: Literally value for money in this prize by Samsung.I could blindly recommend you this phone if you are samsung lover..Everything is just latest...Pros:-Type c port6000mah massive batteryAndroid 11One UI OS 3.1  no blaotwares at allFingerprint sensor is blazing fast works 10 out of 10 times..Amazingle processor is on 8nm technology..Cons:-HD + displayFace unlock not reliableCharger is 15 watt which could be of 20 wattsOverall a all rounder phone in 11,000  by reliable brand samsung.

title: Worst product
body: Worst phone hangs a lot from the day of purchase various problems. Keyboard gets cut in half during some apps hang while calling ... Not able to pick up calls smoothly.

title: Samsung M31 worst display, never buy this phone
body: In almost one year, 3 times display screen has color leak issue (without any handset fall/physical damage) which company never covers under warranty. 3 times paid from my pocket Rs.4800 each time to rectify the issue. Highly disappointed with company poor development policy. Planned to never buy samsung products in future.

title: Good buy
body: Little heavy to handle. But good value for money from all sides. 12k u do not get these stuff. Buy it for daily use and heavy duty hse

title: Best for Gifting
body: Lovely 4 camera design though no 5ghz wifi and 90hz don‚Äôt know what‚Äôs the difference between normal or this. But overall at this price point loaded. Better than Chinese. Yes of course Unnecessary apps could be reduced that come preinstalled.

title: Awesome monster
body: Review after 20 days use,Phones battery life is awesomeCan last all day, I charge once in couple of days,Wi fi calling working perfectly fineFingerprint and face unlock is fast enough,Overall it's Good phone in this price range

title: Go for it for medium-heavy range usage.
body: Using this for more than a month now for not so heavy usage.Battery Life is VERY impressiveCharger is although 18W, still provides more than expected speed of charging.Side mounted fingerprint is pretty quick.Speakers provide just above average sound.Camera is good although not as good as proclaimed 48MP, wide angle and portrait mode available.All and all, this phone has not disppointed me.But would suggest to research other options like Redmi note 10 and compare them yourselves.

title: It's ok ok at this price range
body: Am using M21 from past one year then I ordered this can say M21 is better then M12 design and display but it's also good not bad

title: Mobile hotspot drops for every 20 minutes
body: I am writting this review after using this mobile for almost 2 months.When connected my laptop via mobile Hotspot through this phone it drops off for every 20 minutes. I have to restart the mobile then need to connect again. It is very annoying.I didn't have this problem with my previous mobile and also I don't have any coonectivity issues with my wife's mobile if I use mobile Hotspot on it. Mywife's mobile is lesser in configuration when compared to this mobile. We both have same mobile connection which is Vodafone.I don't know what to to do.

title: The brand caring for all ysers
body: This is my solid rankingafter using Galaxy M12 for a fortnight.Ovweall performance is quite good and comfortable.It would be better if atleast 25 w charger is provided with a big battery.Some critics on you tube had informed " 4 to 5 problems" in all(?) M series phones but I have found none of them in this product although it is of very reasonable price.I am 85 today and yet enjoy my ph. Without any difficulty.SAMSUNG has never any excuse|!

title: Not a good phone as expected
body: I bought this phone before 2 months, Camera is very poor 48 MP it is poorer than 13 MP.I wanted to login my company email, before that device needs to be enrolled with Microsoft Intune company portal. The company portal will only allow when Device encryption feature will be available in phone, but it does not have.This is very important hardware features that secure your phone,s data. So this phone is use less for me to configure outlook.So Guys..Be aware if you are buying any phone and which phone's price is falling day by day...

title: think that in note 1 i much better option than this in. display and camera as well
body:
The media could not be loaded.
                




  ¬†Not quite good decent product but price is too high don't go for itMicromax in note 1 is a much better choice than this in every terms like camera display performance and design so i think u should not buy this phone because there are a lots of more option in this price range from micromax ,redmi ,poco, realme, i bought IT for 9000 in sale.

title: Not a great buy at this pricepoint
body: Phone does not support 5 GHz band for wifi due to this slow internet compared to my old phonePhone is not at all slim, thick phoneIt has a 6000Mah battery but still it drains very fast compared my old oppo F11.Camera performance is just okay.Finger scanner is placed on the side of the body, not comfortable to usePhone is without screen guard and back cover. brand could have provided in the box it would have not added much cost to them.

title: Excellent
body: Finger print reader & camera quality excellent. It senses quickly & good resolution as far as camera is concerned. Battery life depends on usage.Moreover, From my experience  Samsung's after sale service is excellent

title: Phone is too slow
body: This phone is no different from other Samsung phones with respect to the usage speed. While the battery is fantastic, camera is ok. There too much lag while using phone. The worst thing is I noticed all these after my return period is over.

title: Camera quality is very poor and disgusting..
body: I am using this phone since 5 months and overall performance is good but camera is not like 48 mega pixels..  when you take a picture, the picture is cracked.. not clear visible..Battery life is very good.. 2 day backups in normal use.. and day in gaming use..

title: Heavy
body: Using it for about 4 months now. Heavy phone although has plastic body works fine storage is great charges fast Not yet facing any difficulty.

title: Nice phn at this price...!!
body: Overall the mobile is great at this price, although screen is not as bright & speaker is just above average, not as loud as required. battery is very good and goes on for  more than one and half day easily..., camera is good and you can click some very good and bright photos. Overall good option in this price range ( best feature is it has 6gb ram, 128 gb internal memory at this price.)

title: Okay.. not great.
body: The touch is bad. The mobile is heavy. Battery is good. Also, fast charge. Camera is good outdoors. But, low light and indoor quality is not great. Overall, not bad. Okay for regular use. Not for photography or playing games

title: Bad experience , avoid buying this
body: When I received the mobile, neither the speaker nor the mic was working so I did a restart then it started working.This happened frequently so I had to restart frequently. I decided to replace the item as it was faulty but the new product I received has the same issue. Unfortunately this is not returnable so my money is wasted.Very bad experience, please avoid buying this.

title: If you are taking money, you need to be honest on your product promises.
body: Handset is likeable, no doubts. But the quality of display, camera and processor are not full in criteria as mentioned. I have sent a picture captured by 48 mp resolution, you will see that is not clear and  proof that the quality of camera is not good. Display resolution shows to see the diaplay you need to tilt the phone. Sometimes phone went hanged also so that the processor is not good. I have exchanged my old phone which was in well running condition now I am missing that was best against this one. That was solid in his promises. Thankyou

title: Worth Money Smartphone
body: Using it from last 8 months, worth it totally üëç used iPhone earlier and then bought this phone, one thing noticed is battery life, no comparison at all with iPhones, way better than iPhones and many smartphones of this range.Second one is Screen resolution, top quality.Third pro is storage, better than iPhone.Camera is average compared to iPhones and other smartphones so if you want good smartphone with good battery life, storage, screen resolution then must go for this phone. Totally worth it in this criteria

title: 90hz refresh rate not worth
body: Not worth of moneyNot aviled for any special futureIts does noteven have the normal features that other mobile haveüòîüòîüòîüòîüòî

title: Not a best in class phone but a great phone in this budget.
body: 1. A good phone in this range2. Exynos 850 may not sound a great processor for gaming or multitasking, but it actually does a great job.3. No heating issues. (Playing games like FF for 1-2 hrs or attending consecutive meetings on Meet, Zoom & Teams or doing consecutive classes on Unacademy or Adda won't cause a problem)4. Although the camera quality disappointed me, as their remains a high expectation from Samsung Cameras.5. But overall Samsung lives upto its name, with great service centres and customer support.

title: Good mobile in this range
body: As Samsung shows its quality in every launch, this is also a good product in mid range mobiles. All things are good if u r an average user, for high performance gaming & photography other high end models are preferred.

title: Overall review
body: A good buget phone with great battery life.I usually use it for gaming because I can't buy a gaming phone it to expensive. But I can play seemingly all kind of game without lag(I dont mean games like genshin imapact).Overall goodValue for money:8/10 (reason low resolution  comparedd to other  budget smart phone  under 12000)Camera:9/10 (under this price tag the camera  qualityy is good)Chipset:8/10(under this price tag)Battery:10/10(best in this price tag)Overall:7/10

title: Battery life Awesome
body: Battery life is very good. Built quality is also very nice. Camera quality also very good. Fingerprint reader work perfectly and also fast. Overall the phone is very good. Value for money. One of the best choice this phone in this price range.

title: For a normal user, this is the best option.
body: One UI 3.1 and 90hz display makes the user experience heavenly. It has a 8nm processor and really power efficient. Without compromising in the perfomance it gives me more than 2 days of battery life. Camera is decent and the colour reproduction is very good.No hanging or heating problems.It can run high end games in low to medium settings as well but I won't recommend this for gaming purpose.Lot's of features included with the One UI 3.1 core which I liked the most. Overally a great phone for Normal users üëå

title: MIc is not working properly I already
body: MIc is not working properly I already bought M31 same problem with that mobile also .  My mistake is forgot that purchase and again same series phone since have good confidence over Samsung but they never maintaining good quality  . They need lot improvement over testing the product before launching in market

title: Another good product from Samsung Galaxy M12
body: Another good product from Samsung Galaxy M12.  Battery life is very good. Performance is not as good as Qualcomm Snapdragon, but its ok. Only you will find performance difference when you play games. Features are excellent. Camera Quality also good. Value for Money in this range.

title: Better Under Rs. 8500
body: Best Battery, Rear Camera, And fast finger print unlockBut Samsung Galaxy M12 it's Not Support Wifi Dual Band (5GHz)Only Support Single Band (2.4GHz)Overall it's Best Only Under Rs. 8500

title: 6 months free warranty is a fraud, don't buy it from amazon
body: I have purchased this on 6th sep with 6 months free screen replacement. My phone screen broke in a month and when i go back to samsung service center, they denied for screen replcement. Also samsung customer care is saying amazon will do it. Amazon is saying samsung will do it.They are making fool of customers.

title: Awesome purchase.
body: Satisfied with product. Camera quality is okay. Other than that, its a samsung, whoever is used to samsung will love the functioning of this device too.If you are a samsung lover, definately go for it. If you are conscious about new features, gaming, camera quality other options might be available at given price point. Its great for day to day tasks and surfing internet, social media and all. Thumbs up for Samsung

title: Defective item
body: Just stopped working after few hoursIt seems it has a bug. It doesn't work for quite a few hours in the evenings. Not sure how long

title: Phone is good for daily use but i speed of the internet  is worst on the device
body: I buy my first ever & may be last Samsung Phone because mobile phone is good for daily use only the issue which I was noticed when I trying to connect internet  & opened mobile hotspot & connected my laptop or other device  the speed of internet showing below 100 kb/sec it‚Äôs very worst & even I connected my same laptop & other devices with another mobile and same network it‚Äôs showing speed above  500kb/sec the thing is only disappointed me.

title: Value for money
body: Its total value for money. It can handle regular usage like social media, video streaming very well.. fingerprint unlock is pretty fast... Camera and display are on bit downside but to be realistic at this price range its pretty decent. Go for it if you are looking alternative of low cost chinese.

title: Camera quality is so pooooor
body: I don't know why they have mentioned as 48 mega pixel , I am big fan of Samsung.Prior to this mobile I have used Samsung j6 its just 13mega pixel camera quality is just awesome. M12 camera quality is very poooooor.One more issue is Amazon not accepting return until if you receive a defective piece.

title: Disappointed
body: Bit disappointed even after spending 13500 ,you will not getting 5g on wifi this operates only 2.4 g,camera is not up to the mark....battery is good . fingerprint is on lock button this is another drawback.

title: Value for money, Brand value
body: The purpose behind my purchase is accidentally my Samsung A10 fell down and lost the display, so immediately I have selected this model without any second thought, because of the brand value, value for money, features, user-friendly what not all features.  We are happy with this purchase and the way we received our order very timely.

title: Don't go for exchange trick.
body: Don't go for exchenge, it's a trip. They are expecting a brand new device which you could exchange. The intention of the Amazon delivery boy is like to found anything wrong in device and the price will deduct 70% to 80% from its original exchange ammount even it is well running. The attitude of the Amazon delivery boy is too rough and tough. It's my second horrible experience from Amazon end.

title: Worth buying
body: Mobile is as per expectations. Surprisingly no ear phones provided, where as when purchased from shop it is included .

title: Charger head is not working
body: Dear Help desk,This is Joel Deepak, I ordered Samsung Galaxy M12 mobile on 10th April 2021. The product was shipped on 12th April 2021. I received after 3- 5 days. Mobile is 1 year warranty and In box accessories is 6 months warranty.My mobile working fabulous. But, My charger head is not working.I cannot raise any complaint against that fault. That's why I posted here in review section.Please do the needful to replace or service my charger.- Joel Deepak J

title: Waste of money
body: Phone hangs several times and restarts automatically. Raised issue with Amazon customer care, but according to them, issue is not capturing in smartcheck app, hence can not be return or replace. Total waste of money.

title: Amazing smartphone with great battery backup.
body: Display is not that great.Battery is awesome.Camera quality is better than other chinese handsets.Samsung one ui coupled with android 11 experience is superbb. You will love it.Fingerprint reader and face unlock works fast.Speaker is loud also.Exynos chip is underperform slightly than the competion but considering it's a Samsung budget phone so overall it's worth the purchase.

title: DEFECTIVE PHONE DELIVERED
body: SCREEN GOT BLANK JUST AFTER 9 DAYS OF USE.  AT THE TIME OF PURCHASING(25 SEP 21) IT WAS A AMAZON'S CHOICE PRODUCT, BUT TODAY(05 OCT 21) IT IS NOT. SO, IT'S CLEAR THAT amazon's choice TAG IS BEING USED TO CLEAR THE DEFECTIVE PRODUCTS WITH THE SUPPORT OF LUCRATIVE OFFERS. I HAVE BEEN CHEATED.

title: Not a great phone
body: Not sure If its a good phone....I have bought it but its not working properly... throwing a lot of errors....many times calls are not going through even with full signal sometimes after call disconnected there is a strange sound which continues to ring and i have to switch off the phone....If anyone has some idea please suggest

title: Excellent mid range budget phone
body: The phone is a good one to use. It is a 6.5 inch but is handy to use for its balance. It has a 6000 mah battery which gives it a great battery backup with a decent fast charger. It has also a good UI( One UI 3.0). Overall it's a good smartphone which can beat some flagship phone too.

title: All good to have rocket on pocket
body: Well if the question comes what I dislike  about  the phone is absolutely  nothing  it is a proper handy phone allows  to have a well grip. The quad camera  allows  to take  a full depth  of a picture enrich  in color and to take a true tone photo. The finger print is fast like thunder like a touch of your finger and opens in front  of you. The battery  is cool to use you could  say a PowerBar with phone and the make and feel of the phone is like your bide on the wedding night. A cool phone to use and recommend  others.

title: Good for mobile savvy and general users ,not addicted to games only
body: Nothing  found against except it is  a little bulky ,and plastic on back is ordinary ,but it is budget phone and can not be compared with S21 or I phone .It is good for above ordinary use with occasional gaming, Battery easily last for more than two days,I can say you get more than you pay photo. In day light is very good ,uploaded photo is in low light at around 6 pmMovies on Netflix were enjoyable with good sound and colour

title: Unhappy
body: I have received the product today but as mentioned box in the details while purchasing in the box available hand set,manual, ejection pin,adopter. In the box only I have received hand set and adopter, not received the manual and ejection pin. Without ejection pin how should I put my SIM card in my mobile. I am very unhappy with that. Still I am not checking the other details in the phone. I am rated 1 star out of 5 bcoz of above issue. First impression is best impression here I am not seen very in happy.

title: Samsung Galaxy M12: The best!! Go for it!!
body: Just Go For It:Great Value!! Awesome Product!! Great Service!! Samsung is the real deal üëåüëåüëåBetter than the Advertisement!!6GB Ram 6000 Battery! Good Screen!! Decent Processor!! title: 3mths n looks absolute failure.
body: Regretful encounter wth this M12 order , dated 14 th Aug '21.Gifted this product to my sister, it's been just 3 mths today. Display not working, unable to start n poor battery performance.Showed at Samsung gallery for review they said mother board needs to b changed whc will cost 8 k.Please do justice to the lil investments we make around.Kindly oblige, acknowledge n respondNeed full replacement to consider.Team Amazon n collabs.

title: Overall performance is good
body: I am using this phone from 5 days, on this basis I am just giving my feedback.1) Fingerprint reader is different as compare to other Android phones, and it's take some time to detect Fingerprint.2) Rear Camera quality is good but it's not like 48 mega pixels.3) Battery backup is good but its charge slowly.4) Overall performance is good with this price.

title: Best phone under Rs 10K
body: Best phone in this price range!Pros1) Camera is best in class. The photos clicked are so great in quality.2) Phone is fast as anything. Even the heaviest of apps open in a jiffy.3) Fingerprint sensor unlocks the phone in less than a second.4) Colour and looks are so pleasant.Cons1) Display is okay, somewhat yellowish.2) Phone is a little bulky and heavy on hand.

title: Worth evey penny, good budget phone
body: I like the focus mode, that helps to keep apps that are needed active to avoid unwanted notifications to distract ones work. Dark mode and eye protection is also good feature that protects eye. Inbuilt Smart mode helps detect the fraud/spam calls without any external app installation. Camera quality is good with good zoom capability. Phone is light and slim with good responsive touch sensor. Overall Phone is very good for my purchase budgetof Rs9500.

title: Great phone, but..
body: It's a great phone from Samsung in budget series. I will not waste your time nor mine.so coming to the point all things are positive so I'm gonna tell you negative fingerprint reader is on the side on power button It's just okay quality. And other thing is cameras are also good but front one is just OK. But overall in this price range it's awesome and if you are confused between redmi 10 and Samsung m12  just go for it.It's just great and above all it's Samsung, üòâ

title: Ordinary phone
body: Slighly bigger than M10, M21 amd M31. Other than 6 GB Ram 128 GB storage and 6000 MaH battery, everything is ordinary. They could have given a better screen for this price. Even charging cable is shorter than optimum.

title: Touchscreen issues, Display issues, Bad Hardware and Delay in Mobile.
body: Touchscreen issues, Display issues, Bad Hardware and Delay in Mobile. When brough mobile normal apps looks finme still slow display but few apps like phone pe etc these keys are not matching and responses are slow overal display issues and touchscreen issues are there . unfortunately i installed phone pe and found this issue after return window and now not sure what needs to be done very bad display and touchscreen not worth to buy this mobile. I tried all updates etc within 7/8 days have issues .

title: Worst ever from Samsung
body: Touch is extremely bad and is irritating as it doesn‚Äôt recognize and hangs up.Have to lock and unlock several times to get other apps working.When phone is locked, despite double / triple tapping the screen, it doesn‚Äôt light up or show option to unlock, we have to press the side button yo light the screen which is more frustrating.Extremely slow even though it‚Äôs 4 gb ram

title: Pretty Good.
body: If you are interested in a budget camera phone, this one isn't for you.This phone is pretty smooth. Works for people who don't use phones much like me.Battery life is awesome and I'm enjoying it but cable is a bit short.Overall good phone, would recommend this one if u are really low on budget but if you can spend a bit more, just get the Samsung m30s or m31.This phone just needs improvement in camera and otherwise this is a decent budget phone.

title: Buy Samsung M12 at you privacy risk
body: The mobile comes with lots of bloatware. Needs to be trimmed. Also the contact list is not easy to use when a name has more than 1 contact. Most importantly, searching thru various notifications is difficilt. Privacy is at risk because the pictures keep changing everytime one presses the power button to start - which means all our actions are being recorded somewhere.I do not use thw Fingerprint reader but still it is asking to rate. So gave 1 star raring.

title: AVERAGE!!
body: The Camera is not good it feels like a 13 MP not 48MP the battery life is normal it will last 1 day easily and will charge the full battery in 3hrs but the phone is heavy more than 2000 grams and I have also tried COD Mobile in medium setting the 90hz refresh rate help in gaming and the overall gaming experience is fine. I would suggest you to go for this phone if you are only a normal user, it is not made for heavy gaming

title: Average phone at this range
body: Average phone at this range, phone gets hanged while using some basic apps. Battery life is ok doesn't seem like 6000mah which makes phone heavy , camera quality is average. Only best thing  about the phone is its look.All together I feel you can get a better phone at this price

title: awesome phone thnaks amezone
body: i love samsung ab jab redme ke hi parige me samsung mil raha haj to zabardsti ka add wala phone lene ka kya faida samsung lo

title: Budgeted phone with good quality features.
body: This review is after using phone for 1 week.Likes-Under 10k budget  this phone is very good to use, it's having  almost features like a 14-15k phone,camera quality is also good.My usage of phone is more would say whole day so by the EOD I left with 20-30%batteryDislikes-what I was in need of I dint get that is Wifi-calling option in this phone.Main drawback is if battery reaches below 40- 50 it takes really long time to get fully charged up.

title: Value for money Mobile
body: I am using this for more than a month as of now ....This is a very good Product at the price which Samsung is selling. It says it is MADE IN INDIA.I really like the Battery Backup for me it is lasting for more than 30 hours with moderate uses. Like ( Youtube ,  calling and Hotspot uses)COns : -It is Bulking and feels heavy in pocketFinger print scanner is not up to the mark .. some times it is unable to unlock .

title: Bakwaas phone samsung M12
body: Mere life ka sabse khrab anubhavMai aap Sab se kahunga is samsung M12 mobile ko kabhi mat lena ... Galti se bhi mat lenaDisplay ..... Bahut bahut kharabSpeed ......... Bahut bahut kharabCamera ........ Bahut bahut kharabBattery ....... Bahut bahut kharabFingerprint Reader ........ BakwasMobile charger .......... Bakwas bahut slowerPhone ke quality........ BakwasWeight........... Bahut jada

title: Worst front camera quality
body: Please dont buy if u r expecting good camera quality in this phone...i mean its below below below average...not at all good...Overall phone is good in this range but expected a lot better from samsung.. this mobile should be sold in 7k not more than that...

title: best phone, inalmost every way.
body: The camera is very excellent, better than every single phone in this budget and even higher.Battery is best!!!!!, its battery is THE BEST BATTERY, it works for 3 to 4 days - even though i use it for big tasks like running games and etc.Screen is as good as Iphone's, screen works very fast, refresh rate is V GOOD.never lagged, very good proccessor.

title: Best phone under 10k
body: It's a complete package at such an attractive price. Blue color looks amazing and camera quality is good. Monster battery of 6000 mAh is good for 2 days of normal use. Overall really happy.

title: Wrost Product, Please  don't but this
body: The product has so many issues,  I am adding experience by using it for  3 days .It has network  issueIt has hanging  problemIt has bettey issuesIt has problem with heatingMy overall rating is 1 out of 10 .Please  please  don't go for this phone

title: Touch not responsive gotbstruck on setup screen .Didn't expected this thing from Samsung India.
body:
The media could not be loaded.
                




  ¬†Got struck on the setup screen due to touch is less responsive . Amazon  seller had delivered a malfuncted phone to me.Disappointed by Amazon atleast you should do quality check for the product your selling. Complete waste of time and waste of money.If there is option for negative star I will definitely give that also.Disappointed

title: For slow user it is a good phone
body: Camera ia average, but for decent activity this is really a good buy. Current 6gb varient is available for 10500 after applying offers is a great deal you can definitely buy it. But not for heavy users.

title: Battery was super...
body: Everything is good, battery backup was fantastic,but few problems need to fix. one is more weight, and while using phone pay, Google pay, key pad was showing broken numbers... I don't understand why it is happening.Remaining all are good and best phone in thus price range...

title: Nice product worth buying
body: I ordered this product on 20 July 2021 and immediately it got delivered within a week on 29 July 2021.Mobile camera is good.Battery is betterPerformance and storage is goodOverall it's good mobile for normal android usersThis review is not for  users who play high end games (like ping, free fire etc) in mobile

title: Better battery, poor camera..
body: First impressions:Pros : 2 days battery life if internet is used constantly.RAM is enough to handle the heavy apps smoothly.Runs on latest Android version and Samsung UI.Cons:So so camera quality as compared to similar price range products.

title: Ok In This Budget.
body: Overall in this budget the phone is ok.Primary camera is good, but doesn't seems to be true 48 mp. If you're a selfie lover then dont buy this phone, because the front camera is worst.Decent battery life, can lasts upto 1 and a half day with average use.Processor saw some improvements, asphalt 9 and call of duty is running alright but not smooth. 90 mhz screen is a pure lie by the samsung, the TFT display is poorly managed on the hardware. Fast charging is there.

title: Awesome performance
body: I am so glad to say you that phone was delivered at fully boxed and wrapped around phone.As I using phone, the battery performing above my expectations.Camera is taking stunning pictures as I wish.Fingerprint sensor are working good but not like other.Screen touch also as smooth as the velvet touch.Phone is working at awesome speedy.

title: Mic Quality in video is extremely bad.
body: Mic Quality in video is extremely bad. Cannot explain how bad it is... I ordered 2 phones at my home... both of them have this same issue. Samsung needs to address this immediately. I don't want to talk about other features as this is budget phones. But never seen such a bad quality from this or lower price range.

title: An "also ran" phone.
body: Nothing extra ordinary about this phone. There are much better options in this price range.The battery is definitely good, and lasts more than a full day.However on the down side, the phone is very heavy, camera is ordinary and it feels sluggish to use.

title: For this price, it is a good phone.
body: For this price, it is a good phone. Bit heavy but battery life is good so can't complain there. Camera is okay.. not so great. If you are looking for a good camera then u might not want this phone. Rest it is a good phone.

title: Good phone but cheap plastic. Back panel vibrates on phone.
body: 3 months use review - no voice recording tool, no screen video capture tool, it's usually available on any cheap phone. Samsung says these are available on higher end models, who is a snob?Given 3 stars overall just because of the plastic at the back, during the call it vibrates  cheap plastic casing otherwise phone works fine. Other phones cheaper than this have better casing but then....

title: good one, not a great one
body: got this ph @9999 in offer. the touch, sensor are really bad. especially face recognition, which never recognizes me.application opening, processor speed with min 5 applications and battery life are good

title: Good phone in this price range . Better than Chinese phones
body: Nice product from samsung . I purchased it a few weeks back from Amazon with nice offer and exchange offer . Phone is great for daily routine task . I am using banking with Knox security and never felt any disappointments regarding this.It is not for gaming purpose . It's a value for  money ,good battery life , nice big screen , moderate camera for daily purpose.  Overall it's 5 out of 5 from my side.I wold like to say thanks to Amazon to give a reliable service .

title: Good purchase at this price.
body: It feels good in hand.Screen is not very impressive  as advertised.Battery life is good.Main Camera is average. Front camera is good.It is easily handling both my personal and work environments. I don't see any lag.Over all, it is a very good purchase at this price.PS : not able to find a good back cover as most of the available ones are manufactured for galaxy A12. They fits to M12 but feels like not perfect.

title: Worth buying. Value for money
body: This phone is having all good features and it's finger print reader and face recognizing is working super.Sound and battery  life is goodCamera superAnd all other phone feature are compare to 30k+ ir provided in thisA big thanks to Samsung...loving it.

title: Best device under 10k segment from SAMSUNG.
body: Display is HD+ with TFT panel but it doesn't feel like TFT rather it feels IPS LCD HD+ panel! Good move Samsung! But other brands providing IPS LCD FHD+ 90hz in this 12k segment from Other brands! But initially it's good.

title: Excellent All rounder
body: 1 month since I bought it, excellent all rounder. Great performance, fast, nice camera for d price.Battery is too good, easily lasts 2 days with medium usage.I don't play games, so can't comment on Game performance.Camera is not d best, but for this price, I didn't expect much. Daylight pictures are really great. Video quality is also good.

title: Battery Backup is awesome. Straight 2 days for only calls.
body: I liked the battery backup of the phone and performance is so far good as it is being used by my parents. BEST phone for parents. Takes 2 hours to go from 0-100%. And please don't buy this phone if you are photogenic or require gaming efficiency

title: Phone is best,but ....
body: Mobile is nice5 star in Battery Life5 star in other specs4 star in camera3.5 star in optimization.The optimization is bad due to OneUI. Samsung hasn't made a good UI. It is not optimised. The camera is better,but it don't have more modes while it's competitor Redmi 9 Power have nice camera modes. This mobile is best in all types just the Camera and OneUI is not good

title: This one really affordable and great facilities.
body: I used in and really the feelings was great. It is smooth no hang or down occours. Storage and new camera facility was just good and little bit mora upgarde to the camera needed I think 'Slow motion operation '. Over experience was great. You all have to try it once. For gamers it may little not good as the processor is getting some lapse while using heavy games.My experience was best because with this amount the mobile provides a lot.

title: Average experience
body: At this price, I expect atleast a little better phone. First of all, the processor is slow and lagging. The camera quality is very bad. I mean "very" bad so think about what are the essential things you definitely need before buying. Battery life is fine. Look is average because its quite thick than other models. Overall, I think its okay for general purposes but not a good phone to have.

title: Dull display images. Does not show true colours
body: I bought the phone yesterday. There is a problem with the display and image quality view in this phone. Images appers yellowish and dull. I am thinking of returing the phone.

title: Value for money
body: I think this product is not bad. Those who don't want to take a lot of selfi but want to use Phone for call, to listen music and to watch videos - they can try this M12 .Yes Phone looks slightly heavy but overall good in this price range

title: Warranty issue
body: I have purchased a samsung M12 mobile and 6 months free screen replacement warranty added for prime member at that I am also prime member so this benefit added.After 2 week mobile was Fall down and screen was damaged.So I went to samsung service center and claim the warranty but my mobile insurance plan was not activated so you will be bay and change the screen.Last 25 days I am try to activate my plan but problem was solved upto date.So please solve the problem quickly

title: Not value for money
body: Bad in charging ( not a fast charging  phone take 4 to5 hours for charging)Also battery back is not good enough  drained in 8 hours similar as my earlier  phone .Screen display also not up to mark. ( pixels  are average)Sound quality  in both speakers is bad ( voice clarity  not good)Also phone is slow while operating ( taking pause while using)There are  good option other brands at similar  prices

title: Useless Service from Amazon
body: I always think 10times before I order anything expensive from Amazon because I have got a bad product. But this time dont know why I didn't give a thought. This model of Samsung M12 was available in Amazon only and guess what I received manufacturing defective piece. Seems like Amazon is pleasing customers by making things available in advance which turn out to be defective. Samsung also does not take responsibility of replaceling their defective piece with a new one.

title: Bluetooth connectivity issue in Samsung M12 mobile and it also not supports 5G.
body: There is a Bluetooth connectivity issue in Samsung M12 mobile and it also not supports 5G. Big drawback for this product. I never expected from Samsung that this type of issue will come with phone. I don't know why bluetooth is not supporting to all device. Please provide the Bluetooth connectivity solutions.

title: Delivers for the price range but please don't compare it with Samsung's high end offerings
body: Haven't used it for too long but from the current usage these are the observations1. Battery life is good,  used it to stream movies and music but still worked out fine.2. Camera is ok, again based on specs for the price range.3. Would have liked better packaging and a back cover atleast.

title: If you're not a selfie person I would recommend this.
body: In this price range for the moment one of the best deals. 6000mAh battery really does the job. Fingerprint reader is sensitive but if you using mobile with cover it becomes difficult due to its position. Camera not great not terrible. Touch sensitivity is not that great sometimes it slides when I want to open an app but not that major problem. If you want something with high battery and RAM and storage this is the mobile.

title: Not even 6 months , display lost , worst phone ever
body: Brought this phone in Apr 2021 , kept it for charging when the battery was down and after after hours the display was gone . Don‚Äôt suggest anyone to buy this phone .

title: Excellent Mobile & looks Slim and Stylish
body: I've been using this for some days now and I have to say it's been great. The phone is really sleek and screen resolution is very good. Camera is excellent in Good lighting... Under poor light or night time it may not do so well. Phone is really beautiful though.

title: Not up to mark
body: 6Gb,128 GB phone was much slow than my old phone of 2Gb, 32Gb.Don't go by specifications only, performance not matching for this model.Thanks to Amazon for returning the product.

title: Gaming performance is low
body:
The media could not be loaded.
                




  ¬†Gaming wise very poor

title: decent budget friendly phone with decent above average camera
body: Uhh...the fingerprint scanner is good but i am not a fan of side mounted fingerprint scanner....so thats why the 4 stars... otherwise, everything is fine looking at the price.... though the phone is a bit heavy and bulkier than my other phones.

title: Great budget phone
body: Overall it's the best phone for the price range. Battery life is a blast, sometimes I can go without charging for 2 days on a 2-3 hour screen time. If you start the day at 100, after heavy use you will still be left with the battery at the end of the day.The camera is pretty good too, but not great. I'd say a 4/5 for the camera.The phone is kinda heavy if you are not used to heavy phones then take care for the first 1-2 weeks.

title: A total package with limitations
body: At this cost, this phone is awesome. Camera, Screen, Battery everything is awesome. However, on careful inspection some sensors are missing when compared to Xiaomi and other Chinese brands.

title: Does not support higher WiFi band width 5.0 Ghz, so users won't get higher Wifi speed
body: There is no option for WIFI 5.0 Ghz in this phone. Now-a-days almost all of us have dual band Wifi router in our homes/offices. But this phone will only work with lower speed and lower bandwidth 2.4 Ghz. It cannot detect the higher bandwidth 5.0 Ghz, so you won't get higher Wifi speed

title: Best 4gb Ram phone
body: Pros..Battery stays more than a day at a full recharge.. (Usage : medium)New sensors for motion gestures..Viewing angles nice.Camera - decentCons:Slightly thicker nd weigher..After two days it wasn't noticeable...Verdict: Go for it..

title: UI Totally waste.
body: Worst UI experience from samsung.1. Basic app lock setting missing.2. Data disconnected while in a call.3. While using Amazon custome care chat keyboard hide the typed content.4. SMS selects the recent caller option missing.5. You can't off the alarm for one particular day. You have to off then on the alarm again.5. Unnecessary samsung apps occupy the space which you not even open in your lifetime.

title: Phone worth every penny!!!
body: Since, my colleague is using this phone for the past 20 days, he is extremely satisfied with the product (be its battery life, camera quality or display). The thing which he miss is the Samsung Earphone/headphones which should have been provided with it (thus cutting one star for this). Else everything is okay.

title: Good phone for user with less speed requirements.
body: A phone working good with all app except high end gaming app or some high processor occupied apps. Phone get switched off automatically on high processor usage when multi app functioning. Good at 8.5k price.Camera quality very good without zoom. Very bad with full zoom. Same with selfi cam.Networking : zero problems till now.Rest is good till now in last 1 month from i bought.

title: Mobile for parents
body: Good bettry life so mobile is bit heavy.Not a best camara but fine in this range and its not 48MP totally fake.Overall good for parents who needs bettry life and not photoholic.

title: Google pay ,phone pay are not compatible  with this phone
body: Fingerprint reader not worked properlyIf you unlock  you device 10 times its perfectly  work only 6 times*PHONE PAY* GOOGLE  PAY * NOT WORKING IN THIS DEVICE ,WHEN YOU ENTER  PASSWORD  ITS OVERLAPPED, YOU ARE NOT ABLE TO SEE WHAT ARE YOU ENTEREDI PURCHASE M12 IN APPROX 25 SEPTEMBER  AND WITH IN 2 WEEKS PRICE DOWN BY 2000RS ,ITS SHOWS THAT PRODUCT IS TOTALLY  FLOPED NOW SAMSUNG  JUST CLEARED THE STOCK.

title: Budgeted phone
body: Camera quality good but photo click krne me time bahut lagta.... what's app pr 1 sath 2 camera photo send nhi hoti....10 photos send krni hai(camera wali) to 1 -1 krke hi send krni hogi...battery life super se uper....jb ko mere mobile me na to memory card na hi koi Jada phone data...Phil bhi camera slow.song full volume pr 1dm se high ho Jata hai jb ki 1 point km Kate hi sunai hi nhi deta

title: Good Storage and Camera, Disspoint WLAN No 5 GHZ and frequent Network drop
body: I had purchased M31 and wanted to get a second phone, so got this.Latest OS , Good RAM and internal storage,disappointing  its released in Feb-2021, but didn't provide a 5 ghz WLAN connectivity (my mistake based on M31 thought this will also be available based on release date), also the Network signal gets lost very often.Though it can be expanded to 1TB, would recommend spend an additional INR 4-5K and get M31.Couldn't return.

title: Worst phone . Amazon please return this phone .
body: Very poor quality phone. Camera and display quality is very poor. Poor than even 2 mega pixels camera.Display quality is worsed . Totally use less product.Doesn't meet any quality as advertised by samsung. .I don't want to give even 1 star to this phone.This is worst product of samsung.I want to return this phone.Amazon please return this phone

title: Well done Samsung
body: Complete package, truly it's a Monster Reloaded. Everything from Camera to Speed to Interface is perfect. Only negative thing is that it's bit thick & heavy. It's a Made in India Product.

title: Good Phone.
body: Light weight, lovely colour.UI is good.Camera settings had to be changed as the default picture quality was set to 5MP. After a software update, I could change it to the right MP.

title: screen replacement issue's solution
body: 6 months screen replacement for prime means, third party is providing replacement for prime members only within a certain prime day offer period.In case anyone want replacement, have to contact or raise a request through for replacement. Third party will do the needful accordingly.

title: Never ever buy samsung, within six months, its dead and now at service center
body: Within six months its dead, never ever buy samsung mobile, sorry I never expected this from samsung, it's rebooted again and again, all please avoid samsung they didn't do R&D properly

title: Junk Phone
body: Their is no negative rating option, so i have to give 1 rating to this junk phone.  DON'T BUY this device, after 5 day only its screen become blank tried all possible trouble shooting available online, but this junk phone didn't recover. Finally i have to go to service centre and from their also pathetic response i have to visit 3 different service centre to get this repair. Didn't except such a pathetic product from Samsung.

title: What is the performance of the phone
body: Nice product! I like it so much, battery life is too good I do not drain more the 50% of battery after heavy usage. Camera quality is good, processor is so amazing for day to day usage, fingerprint works pretty well, charing speed is normal. Overall, nice product for day to day usage. And thanks flipkart for so delivery very! I ordered it on 18/03/2021 and get it one 20/03/2021! Thanks flipkart again for fast delivery and a value for money and budget phone in only 11,000 rupees

title: Every bit worthy .... Awesome...
body: The fingerprint sensor is very fast... 90hz display quality is good smooth touch and nice colour production. Battery backup is awesome can play games specially PUBG in HD  easily without lag ,but the portrait sensor is not so impressive, it's just somewhat good. 48mp and other lenses are also awesome ,they capture really impressive images....Overall the mobile is very good . If you have lower budget and about a trustworthy brand , then go for it.

title: I got Display problem after 1.5 month.
body: Even YouTube videos are running screen getting turned off automatically and sound goes normal. This problem is happening unevenly. I have used very gently as it new device and I facing this problem. Please don't waste your money here .be careful with what you are getting

title: Value for money only if the fast changing was there
body: 100% battery charging takes 3hrs of time were slow changing but the battery life is wow it's super, camera quality is super it's just been 3days if any other issues I will update my review in future.

title: Great smartphone, value for money
body: So impressed with the battery backup, and display is good with a great refresh rate, value for money product, that too in a great price. Using this phone along with my S21 Ultra,but still i love this.

title: Monster
body: Battery backup super,Camera quality well... But the macro option worst... Selfi just low quality..Processing speed good...some specification are like to 6000rs mobile phone...Face lock, fingerprint lock are very quickly working...Overall it is monster...

title: Samsung mobile is best
body: Best mobile

title: An awesome budget mobile
body: I am using this mobile for more than 3 monthsEverything is perfect for this priceAn awesome budget mobileIt can run all the games on high settings at 60fps I have played call of duty free fire and bgmi of max settings with 60fpsVery good mobile

title: pathetic buying
body: Amazon didn't allow to write a review until they sold most of the stock, something very fishy.Heating problem. It doesn't work with 5.0GHz WiFi frequency. 2.4GHz is very old school.Camera quality is pathetic (both front and back). Forget about 48MP, pictures are all blur, poorer than a 4MP one.

title: I ordered the mobile , and the additional apps choices should be mine.
body: The mobile is good. When the users switches on the mobile for the first time. it finds it too hard to answer all the preloaded questions or confusions.I ordered the mobile , I am going to use the mobile and the additional apps choices should be mine. Numerous un-necessary additional apps are preloaded. I was forced to un-install all the additional apps that was preloaded un-necessarily.

title: Horrible Camera
body: Very Horrible Camera , was totally disappointed with the camera , very poor camera and bad service by Amazon. which made my life miserable in exchanging this product. I have bought many mobiles earlier and now i will not buy from this site as exchange replacement is very difficult.

title: Not as expected
body: Think twice before you buy the same. Redmi/Realme phones offers much better specs in this price bracket.Samsung mobile having Exynos processor is known for its lagging performance when compared with those having much lower spec SnapDragon processors. Here same case with M12 also.The only reason for which I recommend M12 is, It comes with Android 11 out of the box and latest One UI also it's built quality.

title: Voice issues in device
body: within 5 months of purchasing there is voice issues in mobile. Not able to hear talk from other side suddenly and need to switch off and on mobile frequently, after switching on the mobile there wont be any voice issues for couple of hours but again the issue will arise after some time, after restarting the device, again for some this issue will get resolved. Currently restarting the device min for 10 times in a day.

title: Best buy
body: Wonderful purchase. I got it for 9499. Amazing budget phone, camera is decent and touch sensitivity is good. Battery life is good but it starts to slow down with usage.There is not lagging yet. Fingerprint is prompt in action, but they need to work on the face unlock.If you have a normal usage, with no gaming, this phone is for you. Its a steal deal!!!

title: Product was good but!!!
body: The phone is good.Best for daily use, but if you will play heavy games you may face problem.Camera and built quality is also good.The main problem is with the delivery,The phone was broken and when I complained about it they said we can not do anything,Now I am using a broken phone without any of my fault.0 Star for Amazon!!!If you want to buy any product online don't consider Amazon.

title: Very Happy
body: It's very prior to review because I got it one week before. But, I fully satisfied with Samsung galaxy M12. I am Very Happy for this purchase. This was value for money deal for me.  Thank you Amazon üòäüíì‚ò∫üíóüíõüíñüòäüíìThank you Samsung üòäüíì‚ò∫üíóüíõüíñüòäüíì‚ò∫üíó

title: Best Phone from samsung in this range.
body: Go for this if you want samsung brand and trust.Don't waste your money on chinese phones, samsung nis far better than other brands..Also In this you will get One UI core version but samsung doing amazing job with it's UI and implementation..Battery life is awesome..Recommended phone..

title: very poor camera and display
body: camera quality is very poor and we cannot watch videos in HD(1080) quality.. and upto the mark..

title: SUPPER GOOD !!
body: FINGERPRINT SENSOR IS REALLY GOOD IT READS AND UNLOCKS IN LESS THAN A SECOND AND THE PROCESSOR USED HERE IS AS EQUIVALENT TO SNAPDRAGON 662 , 660 SOMEWHEREIF YOU ARE PLAYING PUBG IT GIVES HD+HIGH ,SMOOTH + ULTRA ,OVERALL THIS PHONE IS GOOD FOR DAILY USAGE AND GAMING BUT IT HAS A 8MP POOR FRONT CAMERA SENSOR IF YOU DONT USE YOUR CAMERA MUCH THIS PHONE IS FOR YOU !

title: Awesome Phone
body: Received the phone on time as promised. The battery backup is just fabulous - 6000 mAh definitely the power backup requirement that every phone needs. Easy to use phone, but some apps are pre loaded which can be deleted if not using. But definitely way ahead than all the other chinese brands. With 6Gb RAM, using the phone is as smooth as silk. I would recommend this phone with the 6GB / 128GB config to others.

title: Disgusting phone
body: Samsung is really worst company.many time I unable to receive the phone calls.I will never buy Samsung phones anymore. I don't know why they forcefully added their apps in the phone and you can't remove them.

title: Value for money
body: I bought this mobile for my mothershe doesnt use much apps , mostly Youtube, insta, wastapp, music , facebook.Cant comment how this mobile performs for GamesOveral nice looking , robust mobile, good processor, camera is also good, charging last upto 2days normal usage

title: Very low quality from Samsung
body: Fingerprint scanner is too slowTouchscreen doesn't respond 5/10 timesNeed to long press many times to get responseNetwork issue..This is review after using this phone for 5 days.Totally disappointed.

title: Good Mobile within its price range
body: Bought the Samsung M12. Good purchase. Worth the price.Likes:1. Exceptional Battery backup2. Fast processing for Game Play3. Good Display clarity4. Very responsive Biometric sensors, especially Face RecognitionNot so Good Camera clarity especially during night time in artifical light. Also, the speaker sound could have been louder.

title: Not bad for the given price
body: I bought the phone the 6GB ram version and have been using it for three days now. Tge functions are smooth and the camera and screesize are great for the prize. It also gets fully charged in an hour. Will review again after a few more days. Can accomodate 2 sim cards plus a sd card simultaneously. Also the finish as the back is textured and matte, not glossy like it seems in the pictures.

title: If you expect to use WIFI in 5GHz band at home , then Dont go for it; it supports only 2.4 GHz
body: If you expect to use WIFI in 5GHz band at home , then Dont go for it; it supports only 2.4 GHz.  Really disappointed after got to know this. it was not highlighted specifically in the retail sites, info is available in Samsung site only.You cant full enjoy an internet speed at home, even if you have 5GHz band router

title: Not got all items written here.
body: It is written that"Whats in the box Handset, Ejection Pin, Manual, Data Cable and Travel Adaptor"I received only Mobile, Data Cable & Adaptor there is no handset Ejection pin manual warranty card and proper bill

title: It's just amazing...loved it‚ù§Ô∏è
body: It's amazing!! It's really a monster reloaded version...works amazingly! Even the Amazon service was nice....it was not damaged when delivered..I has all new features...and is very satisfactory..just how android users need.. camera is nice too..n specially the cover it has got...is very grippy...the phn doesn't slip from handsüòÖ

title: Its okay value for money at this price.
body: Grt product at this price, bank offer also applied.Camera rating 2 starDisplay 2 starBattery & Performance 5 star.Over all good product at this price.

title: Sturdy and long lasting Mobile
body: A sturdy phone with good battery and storage for rough and tough use. Camera is good with good quality front and back cameras. The 6.5" dimension is very good for viewing videos. This at an affordable price makes it a paisa vasool mobile.

title: Not for pubg gammers
body: I have bought this phone for my cousin, whenever he is editing videos or playing new indian version of pubg, phone is getting hang very much.Otherwise phone for normal use is good, not good for video editting and game lovers.

title: Okay!
body: Not much impressed with this product for this price.. Mobile is very bulky and fingerprint sensor is not much handy. Photo quality is just okay when I compare with redmi y3.

title: Phone is Extravagently cool and strong.
body: Everything is very good som people said processor is not good but it's absolutely very epic it can handle any task also I didn't use it for gamingoyher than that video editing is great and battery can stand upto 2days if not use very hardly, it has a great battery , camera is fabulous also galaxy apps give u boost in every way hence this phone is very fabulous under 10K, Hence Proved.

title: Excellent phone at this price range!
body: Camera Quality is great with good processing speed and classy features. Only limitation is with the 5 GHz wifi connection. It only connects to 2.4 GHz wifi network.

title: was expecting more from a 6000mah battery
body: sometimes it lags camera quality is very good but not excellent compared to other phones in 20-30k range despite it having 4 cameras and battery life is good but for a 6000mah battery it shouldve had more battery life and it lags sometimes when calling and stuff overall a good device for the price got it for 8.5k on amazon

title: Battery Problem
body: The mobile takes around 4 hours, and gets drained out in 2-3  hours (ONLY WiFi enable and NO GPS, NO Wif-Calling, NO Hotspot, NO Hotspot, NO Bluetooth) without any usage.Further, the Amazon replacement process is too lengthy and bad. You'll have to go through a technician home visit in the process.

title: Samsung M12 is a good handset but seems to be heavy. Finishing is awesome.

title: Missing Dual band Wifi

title: good proc

title: average quality

title: Exceeds expectations !!

title: POOR CAMERA QUALITY & LONG CHARGING TIME

title: A great phone at great price..

title: Good value for money

title: Sorry can't recommend in d Amazon platform

Samsung doesn't promise much on display but the bothersome unresponsive touch is a big downfall which overrides everything else about the phone.

title: If you want battery phone this is the best phone

title: Do not expect Expensive samsung phones like Performance.

title: Lighter would have been better

As the headphone jack is in the lower part of the panel, you can't keep the phone in upright position when the headphone is plugged in.

title: Best phone in this price range

title: Not bad

M03s has better Value
